programme.title: Pit Bulls and Parolees
programme.desc: Mariah is devastated when she learns that a friend has died. Later, a couple from Tias past are interested in adopting four dogs

programme.title: Pit Bulls and Parolees
programme.desc: Hurricane season is approaching and Tia prepares for the worst. Villalobos employee Rico takes on a new duty when his grandparents adopt a shy dog

programme.title: My Cat from Hell
programme.desc: Jackson Galaxy works with a mother and daughter whose cats are having a territorial spraying match. He also meets with trouble-making cat Bowie, who has been given his last chance

programme.title: My Cat from Hell
programme.desc: Behaviourist Jackson Galaxy helps a single mum whose cat, Pickles, is terrifying her children. He also treats Lucifer, a cat whose food obsession may cost him his life

programme.title: Treehouse Masters
programme.desc: Pete Nelson builds a treetop fortress for a couple who loves all things medieval. Features include a high tower with a round table and thrones, and a loft with a glass floor

programme.desc: Shaun battles high winds to get a lovable cat named Tigger, a repeat offender, back down to his family once again. Meanwhile, Tom comes to the rescue of Fritter

programme.title: Treetop Cat Rescue
programme.desc: Shaun learns the hard way that Cake is not as sweet as his name implies when he tries to reunite this skittish cat with its owners

programme.title: Alaska: The Last Frontier

programme.title: Fish or Die
programme.desc: The anglers follow a lead to a remote river in Greenland, believed to hold huge Arctic char. They also investigate a myth of Atlantic salmon occupying a lone river

programme.title: All Creatures Great and Small
programme.desc: Tristan is welcomed back to Darrowby, where neglected animals and tight-fisted farmers cause problems for the vets. Rural drama, starring Christopher Timothy, Robert Hardy and Peter Davison

programme.title: All Creatures Great and Small
programme.desc: Tristan accidentally injects a farmer with a vaccine intended for cows, while Helen wonders why James is always visiting a pet-less joiner. Rural drama, starring Christopher Timothy and Peter Davison

programme.title: All Creatures Great and Small
programme.sub-title: If Music Be the Food of Love
programme.desc: The vets are puzzled when Farmer Biggins asks them to treat his perfectly healthy cows, while Tristan discovers the object of his affections sings in the choral society. Rural drama, starring Christopher Timothy, Robert Hardy and Peter Davison

programme.title: All Your Faces
programme.desc: Victims of violent crime and perpetrators meet up in a restorative justice group in order to engage in mediated dialogue and try to heal from their trauma. Among the participants are a victim of sexual assault, three people who have been burgled or robbed and offenders convicted of violent robberies. French drama, starring Birane Ba and Leïla Bekhti

programme.title: Parkinson
programme.sub-title: Goldie Hawn, Thora Hird and John Blashford-Snell
programme.desc: An edition of the chat show from 1981 in which Michael Parkinson is joined by actresses Goldie Hawn and Thora Hird and explorer John Blashford-Snell

programme.title: The Good Life
programme.desc: Jerry takes out yet another endowment policy and Tom and Barbara begin to have misgivings about their plans for old age. Special performance of the classic comedy that was originally recorded in the presence of Elizabeth II and Prince Philip and first broadcast in 1978

programme.title: Yes, Prime Minister
programme.desc: The government faces financial ruin, but that does not seem to worry Sir Humphrey, who goes to extreme lengths to get his latest pay rise scheme approved. Political comedy, starring Paul Eddington and Nigel Hawthorne

programme.title: All Creatures Great and Small
programme.desc: Tristan is welcomed back to Darrowby, where neglected animals and tight-fisted farmers cause problems for the vets. Rural drama, starring Christopher Timothy, Robert Hardy and Peter Davison

programme.title: Fred Dibnahs Age of Steam
programme.desc: An examination of the major advances made with the invention of the steam turbine, which is still used today to generate electricity in coal-fired and nuclear power stations. Fred also discovers how the countrys steam heritage is preserved by museums and societies throughout the country

programme.title: Pubs, Ponds and Power: The Story of the Village
programme.desc: Archaeologist Ben Robinson explores the history of Cromford in Derbyshire, which was at the heart of 18th-century industrialist Richard Arkwrights mechanised cotton mills and a textile revolution. Ben discovers Cromford became a new kind of village, built to service the enterprise of this powerful man

programme.title: Matthew Bournes Sleeping Beauty
programme.desc: After tackling The Nutcracker and Swan Lake, choreographer Matthew Bourne completes the set of Tchaikovskys ballets with a production of Sleeping Beauty, performed by his New Adventures dance company at Sadlers Wells in London. Bournes scenario turns the classic fairy tale upside down as he creates a supernatural love story across the decades, featuring vampires, fairies and decadent gothic opulence

programme.title: Clive James: Postcard from Rome
programme.desc: Clive spends time in the Italian capital as he goes in search of the dolce vita in the eternal cityand tries to acquire some Roman sophistication. During his stay, he meets a socialite prince and Mussolinis son and learns a lesson from a sexologist. First broadcast in 1990

programme.title: The Age of Uncertainty
programme.desc: John Kenneth Galbraith looks at cities, examining the economic and social forces that turned the concept of the princely city into the modern metropolis with all its tensions

programme.title: The Age of Uncertainty
programme.desc: John Kenneth Galbraith sets out on a physical and figurative journey to recapture his experience of democracy, comparing politics in Switzerland, Britain and the US and emphasising Nehrus influence in India.

programme.title: Breakfast
programme.desc: A round-up of national and international news, plus sports reports, weather forecasts and arts and entertainment features

programme.title: Saturday Kitchen Live
programme.desc: Matt Tebbutt is joined by chefs Imad Alarnab and Ravinder Bhogal and special guest Tom Allen. Helen McGinn picks the wines and Martha Swales shares tips on growing your own food

programme.title: Mary at 90: A Lifetime of Cooking
programme.desc: Mary Berry is joined by broadcaster Alex Jones and they celebrate how Marys friends and family, as well as the viewers, have been at the heart of her cooking for 60 years. Together, they cook a cheesy mushroom and spinach lasagne, a reinvention of Marys 1970s chocolate cake, her husband Pauls favourite cheesy nutter snacks, and her Victoria sandwich

programme.title: Football Focus
programme.desc: A look ahead to the weekends matches, including Arsenal v Manchester City. Plus, news from the lunchtime game between Burnley and Chelsea

programme.title: BBC News
programme.desc: A round-up of the latest headlines

programme.title: Weather
programme.desc: The latest forecast

programme.title: The Gruffalo
programme.desc: Animated adaptation of Julia Donaldsons best-selling childrens book. It tells the tale of a little mouse who takes a walk through the woods in search of a nut, only to encounter a fox, an owl and a snake who all want to eat him. To escape their clutches, the quick-witted rodent creates an imaginary monster to scare away his attackers - but it turns out to be all too real. Robbie Coltrane heads the voice cast as the Gruffalo, with James Corden as the Mouse and Rob Brydon, John Hurt and Tom Wilkinson as the predators

programme.title: The Gruffalos Child
programme.desc: Animated adaptation of the sequel to Julia Donaldsons best-selling childrens book, reuniting all the voice cast from the original. The Gruffalo has raised his daughter on tales of the big, bad mouse, the only creature in the forest he is frightened of. Despite her fathers warnings, she sets off in search of this scary creature, along the way encountering the snake, owl and the fox. But when she still has no luck finding the evil rodent, she begins to think he does not exist after all. Robbie Coltrane, James Corden and Rob Brydon lend their voices, with Shirley Henderson as Gruffalo Jr

programme.title: Bargain Hunt
programme.desc: Husband and wife Peter and Stella compete against siblings Matthew and Katie, exploring the medieval Warwickshire town of Stratford-upon-Avon for items of value, alongside experts Tim Weeks and Izzie Balmer. Charlie Ross monitors their progress and also catches up with Thomas Forrester, who brings along an amazing collection of playing cards, some dating back to the 16th century. Charlie learns how the 100 years war brought playing cards to Britain and discovers how the earliest cards also act as a fascinating social record of life during the 16th and 17th centuries

programme.title: Money for Nothing
programme.desc: At Beaconsfield recycling centre in Buckinghamshire, Jacqui Joseph sifts through the car boots in search of three hidden gems she can save, transform and turn a profit on. Upholsterer Simion Hawtin-Smith takes on a pair of retro chairs, while woodworker Ollie Allen reimagines a rusty metal filing cabinet. Jacqui herself sees profit-making potential in some innocuous rolls of fabric

programme.title: Garden Rescue
programme.desc: In Cwmbran, south Wales, Charlie Dimmock and Lee Burkhill are tasked with creating a relaxed, free-flowing garden with a seating area and a way to attract wildlife for retired archaeologist Jane on a budget of £6,000

programme.title: Escape to the Country
programme.desc: Alistair Appleton helps an opera singer and his husband find a house in Norfolk with space inside to hold small concerts and a garden big enough to keep a couple of pigs

programme.title: Final Score
programme.desc: Jason Mohammad presents a round-up of the results and this afternoons news from the Premier League, EFL and Scotland

programme.title: BBC News
programme.desc: A round-up of the latest headlines

programme.title: Weather
programme.desc: The latest forecast

programme.title: Alan Carrs Picture Slam
programme.desc: Alan Carr hosts the game show in which three teams of contestants have to identify a board full of images, with a chance of winning up to £10,000 if they know them all. The contestants are siblings Jack and Hannah from Aberdare and Cardiff, mother and daughter Jacqui and Lola from Stockport, and friends Mel and Liz from Sydenham and High Wycombe

programme.title: Strictly Come Dancing
programme.desc: Tess Daly, Claudia Winkleman and the Strictly entourage head to Blackpools world-famous Tower Ballroom, where things get started with a routine featuring the professionals and pop superstars Steps. Over the years the Tower Ballrooms elegant surroundings have been host to thousands of amateur and professional dancers and tonight the tradition continues as Alex Kingston, Amber Davies, Balvinider Sopal, George Clarke, Karen Carney and Lewis Cope battle to get their names at the top of the leaderboard - although La Voix will not be with them after sustaining an injury

programme.title: Michael McIntyres The Wheel
programme.desc: Game show, with celebrity experts Clare Balding, Zoe Ball, Bill Bailey, Lou Sanders, Konnie Huq, Tommy Fury and - in the twin chair - best pals Sam Thompson and Pete Wicks. Their job is to help contestants answer questions - aware that one wrong answer means someone else gets a chance

programme.title: Wild Cherry
programme.sub-title: Call It Mothers Intuition or Whatever
programme.desc: As the police hunt for Iris, the mothers refuse to listen to Lornas concerns about what the girls are up to. Juliet falls out with Lorna and gets closer to Gigi, while Allegra does a secret deal with K Rizz. The App gets more dangerous, with serious consequences as a photo circulates

programme.desc: A round-up of the latest headlines

programme.title: Match of the Day
programme.desc: Highlights of the latest Premier League matches, including Liverpool v Nottingham Forest at Anfield and Newcastle United v Manchester City at St James Park. Liverpool suffered their first defeat of Arne Slots reign at home to Forest last term, with Callum Hudson-Odoi scoring the only goal of the game. Newcastle were looking for their first home win over the Citizens in the league since January 2019. Plus, Burnley v Chelsea, Bournemouth v West Ham United, Brighton and Hove Albion v Brentford, Fulham v Sunderland and Wolverhampton Wanderers v Crystal Palace

programme.title: The Football Interview
programme.desc: Kelly Somers has a conversation with Arsenal and England winger Bukayo Saka

programme.title: Cyrano
programme.desc: Poet and swordsman Cyrano de Bergerac can improvise a poem while fighting a duel, but is too self-conscious to woo the love of his life. Seeking an outlet for his feelings, he helps a handsome but shy friend to win her heart through love letters. Musical romance, starring Peter Dinklage, Haley Bennett and Kelvin Harrison Jr

programme.desc: Interviews with key politicians and public figures

programme.title: Sunday Politics Northern Ireland
programme.desc: Mark Carruthers looks at the political developments of the week and questions policy makers on the key issues

programme.title: Sunday Morning Live
programme.desc: Sean Fletcher and Jennifer Reoch host topical debate covering religious, moral and ethical issues, with guest panellists and contributions from viewers

programme.title: Prayer and Reflection
programme.sub-title: St Patricks Roman Catholic Cathedral, Armagh
programme.desc: The Most Rev Eamon Martin, Archbishop of Armagh and Primate of All Ireland, leads an evening prayer service from St Patricks Roman Catholic Cathedral, Armagh, to mark the 50th Anniversary of the canonisation of St Oliver Plunkett, who served as archbishop there in the 17th century

programme.title: Bargain Hunt
programme.desc: Eric Knowles hosts from an antiques fair in Guildford, Surrey, and visits a former Victorian workhouse. Experts Raj Bisram and Stephanie Connell assist the teams

programme.desc: A round-up of the latest headlines

programme.desc: A look ahead to the latest forecast

programme.title: Songs of Praise
programme.desc: Aled Jones and Kate Bottley host a singalong of school assembly hymns from Victoria Hall, Bolton. James B Partridge joins them to count down the top 20

programme.title: Points of View
programme.desc: Viewers opinions on BBC shows and behind-the-scenes reports on new programmes

programme.title: Blue Planet II
programme.desc: Footage of wildlife inhabiting underwater kelp forests, including thousands of giant cuttlefish spawning along a restricted area of rocky reef off the south coast of Australia. Males outnumber females 11 to one, which leads to fierce competition. Larger males use brute force to drive off competition, while their smaller rivals use deception by mimicking the appearance of females. The programme also features tiger sharks hunting for green turtles in fields of seagrass and spider crabs trying to avoid predators while they shed their shells

programme.title: Kingdom
programme.desc: As the wet season transforms Nsefu into a lush green paradise, Storms wild dog pups must learn to navigate their new, flooded world. When their mother gives birth to a second litter, disaster strikes and the dogs place in the kingdom hangs in the balance. Leopard mother Olimba clashes with her daughter, who is forced to grow up fast. The lion prides dominance intensifies, with devastating consequences for the hyena clan

programme.title: Shaun the Sheep: The Flight Before Christmas
programme.desc: Its Christmas Eve at Mossy Bottom Farm, but Shauns seasonal excitement turns to dismay when a farmhouse raid to get bigger stockings inadvertently leads to Timmy heading off to a Christmas market in the back of the farmers truck. Shaun sets out to get his cousin back before he becomes someone elses present. Animated adventure, with the voices of Justin Fletcher and Marcus Brigstocke

programme.title: Dolittle
programme.desc: In Victorian era Britain, Dr John Dolittle is a Welsh vet with the ability to communicate with animals. After his wife, Lily, dies at sea, he retreats from society and only tends to animals. However, he is eventually drawn into a mission to save the Queens life. Fantasy adventure, starring Robert Downey Jr, Antonio Banderas and Michael Sheen, while Emma Thompson, Rami Malek and Tom Holland lend their voices to some of the creatures

programme.title: BBC News
programme.desc: A round-up of the latest headlines

programme.title: Weather
programme.desc: The latest forecast

programme.title: Countryfile
programme.desc: Anita Rani and Joe Crowley visit the Somerset Levels. Anita joins those caring for this remarkable wetland, helping to revive habitats for returning wildlife, while Joe meets a farming family whove weathered years of flooding to see how theyre bracing for another storm season. Plus, Tom Heap investigates the food scams that are stealing farmers identities

programme.title: Kingdom
programme.desc: Lioness Rita is raising the next generation, but caring for her cubs alone leaves them vulnerable while she hunts. The hyenas strength is growing, but a flooded den spells disaster and the clan become separated. Seeking a mate, leopard Olimba begins a new chapter, but in her way is her daughter - she has now become her main rival, and only one can remain

programme.title: Strictly Come Dancing
programme.desc: Tess Daly and Claudia Winkleman present from Blackpool Tower Ballroom, revealing who is in the bottom two. The professionals perform a group number before the lowest-scoring couples dance off to decide who will be next to leave. Theres also music by Lewis Capaldi, and a group of former Strictly celebrities return to the dancefloor to revisit some iconic routines

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.sub-title: Hill of Tarvit Mansion and Garden 3
programme.desc: Fiona Bruce presents the show from Hill of Tarvit Mansion and Garden, Fife, and visits the Wemyss School of Needlework, set up in the 19th century by a local philanthropist. Treasures discovered by the team of experts include a necklace gifted by an African king, a beautiful Lalique clock and a fragile horse and carriage, made from straw

programme.title: Prisoner 951
programme.desc: Drama based on the true story of Nazanin Zaghari-Ratcliffes imprisonment in Iran for six years for crimes she didnt commit, leaving her separated from her daughter, who was just 22 months old at the time of her arrest. In the UK, her husband Richard fights both the British and Iranian governments to facilitate her release. Starring Narges Rashidi and Joseph Fiennes

programme.title: Match of the Day
programme.desc: Highlights of the latest Premier League matches, featuring Arsenal v Tottenham Hotspur at Emirates Stadium and Leeds United v Aston Villa at Elland Road. The Gunners defeated their north London rivals 2-1 at home and 1-0 away last term, but Spurs had shown signs of improvement this term. Leeds and the Villans last met in the 2022/23 season, when the teams drew 0-0 here and the Midlanders prevailed 2-1 in front of their own fans

programme.title: The Eubanks: Like Father, Like Son
programme.desc: Former boxing star Chris Eubank and his son Chris Eubank Jr, who followed his father into the sport, are reunited after years apart to confront their fractured past. The film follows the pair as they explore their legacy, grief and the emotional cost of a life in the ring

programme.title: The Graham Norton Show
programme.desc: The host is joined by Hollywood stars Hugh Jackman and Kate Hudson, who play a Neil Diamond tribute act in the biographical drama Song Sung Blue. Comic actor Ben Stiller discusses Stiller and Meara: Nothing Is Lost, his documentary about his comedy-duo parents Jerry Stiller and Anne Meara, while Oscar-winner DaVine Joy Randolph reflects on her afterlife romcom Eternity. Plus, American singer-songwriter Sombr performs his current single 12 to 12

programme.title: Weather for the Week Ahead
programme.desc: A look ahead to the latest forecast

programme.title: BBC News
programme.desc: A round-up of the latest headlines

programme.title: Doctor Who Confidential
programme.desc: The demands of filming at Stonehenge in winter, and the origins of the Pandorica are explored by the cast

programme.title: Doctor Who Confidential
programme.desc: A behind-the-scenes look at the making of the series finale, The Big Bang. Plus, highlights of Matt Smith and Karen Gillans trip to promote the show in the USA

programme.title: Doctor Who
programme.desc: Part one of two. The Time Lord receives a warning about the opening of the Pandorica, a box that legend says is a prison for the most deadly being in the universe. As the Doctor resolves to stop the threat, he finds that the key could be a love story that survives for thousands of years. Matt Smith and Karen Gillan star, with Alex Kingston returning as River Song

programme.title: Gavin and Stacey
programme.desc: On Christmas Eve, the Wests join the Shipmans for one of Micks famous turkey dinners. Smithy can hardly wait to spend his first yuletide with baby Neil, but fails to realise Dave will be tagging along and playing happy families with Nessa. Meanwhile, Gavin and Stacey make an announcement that does not exactly fill their friends and relatives with joy, and Bryn has a heart-to-heart with Jason. Festive edition of the comedy from 2008, starring Mathew Horne and Joanna Page

programme.title: The Holiday
programme.desc: Two single women living on opposite sides of the Atlantic agree to exchange houses over the Christmas holidays. In their new surroundings, both women unexpectedly encounter prospective partners, but as the house swap draws to a close, difficult decisions have to be made about their blossoming relationships. Romantic comedy, starring Cameron Diaz, Kate Winslet, Jack Black, Jude Law and Eli Wallach

programme.title: Daddy Issues
programme.desc: Sitcom about a father and daughter reunited when the latter falls pregnant. Exhausted Gemma, living with her three-month-old daughter, sees her formerly estranged mother Davina move in. Instead of helping, her mum lives an irritatingly carefree life. Meanwhile, father Malcolm is living back at the bedsit, sleeping on an inflatable bed on the landing. Missing her dad and in a state of despair, Gemma conspires with Malcolm and Derek to hatch a plot to oust Davina. Starring Aimee Lou Wood, David Morrissey, Jill Halfpenny and Sarah Hadland

programme.title: RuPauls Drag Race UK
programme.desc: The search for the UKs Next Drag Race Superstar is nearly over, and Mama Ru is testing the queens comedy chops with a challenge that has seen many a well-seasoned queen fall at the last hurdle, the comedy roast - and this one comes with an added new-age twist. Comedian, writer and actor Sophie Willan is on hand to help coach the queens and joins Ru, Michelle Visage, and Alan Carr on the judging panel as the contestants vie for a much coveted place in the final

programme.title: Two Pints of Lager and a Packet of Crisps
programme.desc: Janet struggles to accept Jonnys death, and decides she must race through the stages of grief - denial, anger, bargaining, depression and acceptance - for the sake of her son Corinthian. Louise struggles to convince her friends she is pregnant while keeping her Auntie Val in the dark. Comedy, starring Sheridan Smith

programme.title: Two Pints of Lager and a Packet of Crisps
programme.desc: Louise becomes desperate to move in with Janet, but is repeatedly rebuffed, and tries to persuade her by contacting the spirit of Jonny in a suspicious seance. Donna comes to the conclusion that her slightly camp boss Tim is homosexual, even though he is happily married with children, and resolves to help him come out of the closet

programme.title: Two Pints of Lager and a Packet of Crisps

programme.desc: Every time Mush-Mush has tried to surprise his friend with a gift, Chep has always found out what it was. But Chep promises that this time he won’t. / Mushpie loves to sing. Only problem she is terrible at it! But Lilit, who has never heard her sing before, wants to make Mushpie happy and organizes a concert for her to sing. / When Mushpot wishes he could roll back the seasons and relive being a Mushler, our friends get him to hang out doing cool Mushler stuff. / Mush-Mush can’t figure out why his sense foot keeps buzzing like crazy… until an earthquake shakes the forest. Mush-Mush is sure he predicted it!

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.sub-title: A Frog Of A Problem/Fool The Forest/Mushroomates/Race The Beast
programme.desc: Mush-Mush’s favourite frog has had its home taken over by a lizard. Mushpot says not to interfere – nature will balance itself out. / It’s Fool the Forest Day! Mushables pull pranks all over Mushton, and Mush-Mush has an epic one planned. / When ants invade Fung and Miff’s tree, our Mushlers offer for them to move in… but the two quickly turn out to be unbearable roommates. / Mush-Mush and his friends are determined to win the bark sledge race, but their essential fourth team member drops out.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.sub-title: Getting Truffy With It/Good Vibrations/Puffs Perfect Picnic/Run, Mushpie, Run
programme.desc: Truff is happy. He has found a necklace that makes him even Truffier! Except he had no idea the necklace belongs to Starmush. / Lilit is under pressure. Truff, the most talented musician in Mushton, has invited her, Mush-Mush and Chep to form a band with him. / Because he has won the moss-ball game last year, Puff is in charge of organizing this Summer’s Picnic. Only Puff isn’t comfortable in that role. / Mush-Mush, Chep and Lilit notice that Mushpie seems in great shape lately. They want to feel as great as she does and try to discover her secret.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.sub-title: My Muddy Buddy/Mushlers to the Rescue/Shine, Lilit, Shine/Eyes on the Surprise/The Show Mush Go On/Mushpots Treasure
programme.desc: When Lilit creates a ‘friends tree’ mapping out who everyone is best friends with in Mushton, she realizes Muddler has no friends at all. / Having rescued a Mushlet, Mush-Mush, Chep and Lilit becomes heroes in Mushton, and they’re loving it! / The Beacon Mushroom that guides the Mushables back to Mushton in the dark has gone out. / Every time Mush-Mush has tried to surprise his friend with a gift, Chep has always found out what it was. But Chep promises that this time he won’t. / Mushpie loves to sing. Only problem she is terrible at it! / When Mushpot wishes he could roll back the seasons and relive being a Mushler, our friends get him to hang out doing cool Mushler stuff

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: ...Entrance!/Lemmings Indigestion/Sonata in Bear Major/Bear Fractions/The Bear That Laid Golden Eggs/Crash Training Course => The Lemmings prepare a dream afternoon snack with the last jar of chocolate spread in the cupboard. Tough luck Grizzy is coming! / Grizzy finds he can print images from the rangers camera. / A crate of jars of chocolate spread is delivered. / As usual Grizzy picks the door of the Rangers log cabin to come in and make himself comfortable but this time its impossible to enter! / The Lemmings have got hold of beans with strange properties. / Grizzy wants to get rid of the old piano at any cost. / The Lemmings inherit a crate that fell off an army convoy. / The Lemmings want to get their hands on a firework rocket. / Grizzy finds a high-tech gadget that enables you to learn anything within seconds. He can now become the perfect bear!

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.sub-title: Surprise, Its Spring/The Missing Mushlet/The Hero Trap/Bird Call/Let It Bee
programme.desc: Puff doesn’t like change much. And with spring about to burst forth and all the changes spring brings, he is puffing out nervous fog which is blanketing the whole of Mushton. / So Mushpie can take a break, Mush-Mush, Chep and Lilit offer to look after the Mushies, assuring her that everything will be fine. / The Mushlets love Mush-Mush’s heroic stories. But when they demand to see him actually do something heroic, Mush-Mush feels he can’t back out. / Chanterelle has built a whistle that can reproduce the most beautiful sound of the forest: the one of the Nightingale. / Wanting to rush off to climb Mush Mountain, Mush-Mush is in a hurry checking nectar level in flowers – a job that takes time and care.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.sub-title: Fly, Chase, Fly/Get The Egg Home/Stuck In The Mud/Save The Fun Tree
programme.desc: Chep is disappointed Mush-Mush and Lilit are too busy leaf-gliding to play moss-ball with him, so he hangs out with a new weevil friend instead. / When an egg blows down into the village, it is Mush-Mush and friends’ mission to return it to Mush Mountain. / When Fung and Miff spoil Mush-Mush’s fun tunnel surprise he has been working on for ages, he wishes their day was ruined too. / Mush-Mush and friends’ favourite play tree is rotten and doomed. Our friends, track down Starmush, hoping his powers can save it.

programme.desc: Elmore residents are going missing, and the cause of these disappearances may be closer to home than Gumball and Darwin think. / Gumball and Darwin agree to do all of Tobiass chores, in exchange for good points! / When Rocky suggests that the Elmore Junior High kids skip school the bus is boarded by criminals who seem to want to teach them the importance of school attendance. / Ever wondered what the people of Elmore dream about? They find out that they can help improve habitats for plants and animals and that their rough bark is a great place for insects to hide from predators. On the way, they spot a red squirrel out looking for seeds to eat.

programme.desc: The Seattle shrink reads a steamy novel written by an old acquaintance from Boston - and discovers his teenage affair with a piano teacher has found its way into the plot. Comedy, starring Kelsey Grammer

programme.title: Frasier

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Bart tries to impress his tough new friends by decapitating a statue of the towns founder Jebediah Springfield, but his act of vandalism only succeeds in turning everybody against him

programme.title: Formula 1
programme.sub-title: 2025 Las Vegas Grand Prix Qualifying Highlights

programme.title: Come Dine with Me: The Professionals
programme.desc: The owners of three restaurants in Oxfordshire battle it out, where a lack of rice, no choice of how meat is cooked and a showstopping souffle are on the menu

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: Loretta and Carl from Leicester hope to find the perfect holiday home in the seaside resort of Mojácar in south-east Spain. With busy and stressful jobs, they want a bolthole in the sun where they can relax and unwind whenever they like. Laura Hamilton shows them five options within their £100,000. Will Loretta and Carl love any of them enough to put in an offer?

programme.title: George Clarkes Amazing Spaces
programme.desc: The architect meets a couple who are converting a rusty ships wheelhouse into head-turning accommodation for their Welsh glampsite. In Scotland, George revisits a designer who he met on the first series to see a pair of his gorgeous new eco-builds. He ends his Denmark trip at a modernist home and finally gets to reveal his own amazing space - a cabin in the sky, built on an old scissor lift

programme.title: Location, Location, Location
programme.desc: Karen and Richard have a large budget but no luck when it comes to making a deal, so they enlist the help of Kirstie Allsopp in their search for a family home in the West Midlands. Having already sold up in London, the pair are desperate to settle down with their three children but Kirstie thinks it might be their very specific wish list that is the problem. Camilla and Liam are struggling to keep up with the fast-moving market and can rarely book viewings before properties are sold so they ask Phil Spencer to help them in their search for a property to start a family in. With Nurse Camilla often working nightshifts, the pair are struggling to fit in some house hunting, after some time with Phil there are two contenders but some quick decisions must be made to avoid losing out yet again

programme.title: Kirstie and Phils Love It or List It
programme.desc: Kirstie Allsopp and Phil Spencer visit the garden city of Milton Keynes to bring harmony to a couple who are worlds apart - both physically and emotionally. Anne-Marie and Paul bought their charming-but-challenging 1920s three-bedroom home six years ago, right before the arrival of their first child. The property was a doer-upper but hasnt been done up yet! Paul wants to list it. Between his twice-a-week 160-mile commute to Manchester, the boxed-in kitchen, and the unforgivable absence of a bathtub in their only bathroom, hes ready to cut his losses and move on. Anne-Marie, on the other hand, refuses to throw in the towel. With family close by and a belief in the houses untapped potential, shes clinging to her dream and counting on Kirstie to work her magic and convince Paul to fall in love with their home again. With a £50,000 Love It budget and an ambitious to-do list, Kirstie gets straight to work, crafting a master plan to unlock every ounce of the houses potential. But just as things get rolling, disaster strikes - a surprise roof repair gobbles up a significant chunk of the budget, leaving Team Love It to rethink their strategy. Meanwhile, Phil takes Anne-Marie and Paul to Rugby, hoping to split the commute burden, and finds jaw-dropping properties with his £500,000 List It budget that leave Anne-Marie questioning her allegiances and Paul well and truly sold

programme.title: New Zealands Best Homes with Phil Spencer
programme.desc: In Auckland suburb Parnell, Phil visits a city home for a busy family, surrounded by gardens. Out in the countryside, Phil meets architect Jo Craddock at her split-level home, which is made out of cedar and concrete with bespoke timber joinery, five bedrooms, two large living areas, a 25-metre lap pool, a 50-metre hallway and its own jetty. In Queenstown, Phil visits The Lake House, an extensive renovation on the banks of Lake Hayes, which contains a number of hidden doors and secret rooms

programme.title: Channel 4 News
programme.desc: Including sport and weather

programme.title: Bettany Hughes Treasures of the World
programme.sub-title: Hidden Estonia: Land of Fire and Ice
programme.desc: Bettanys journey into Estonias rich history begins in a lab where archaeology and genetics intersect to reveal a portrait of a prehistoric teen derived from a 10,000-year-old piece of chewed tar. Bettany immerses herself in the traditions of an Orthodox community that maintains ancient pre-Christian beliefs, explores Estonias underwater heritage, and wraps up the trip with a mystical smoke sauna and a taste of a viper-infused spirit

programme.title: New Zealand by Train
programme.desc: New Zealand is home to some of the worlds most spectacular landscapes, and this two-part series explores three of the countrys major scenic rail journeys. The first episode follows two rail routes on South Island, the spectacular Coastal Pacific running through the hills and vineyards of Marlborough to the small coastal town Kaikoura, and the TranzAlpine, crossing the Canterbury Plains towards the Southern Alps and Arthurs Pass National Park. Narrated by Julie Walters

programme.title: Hitlers DNA: Blueprint of a Dictator
programme.desc: Part two of two. The team discover that Hitler may have had a genetic mutation that causes a medical condition called Kallmann Syndrome, which disrupts the development of sex organs. Turi King and the team make several extraordinary genetic discoveries concerning Hitlers high likelihood of suffering from schizophrenia and bipolar disorder

programme.title: The Serpent Queen
programme.desc: Historical drama, starring Samantha Morton. At the tender age of 14, orphan Catherine de Medici is forced into a political marriage orchestrated by the pope. Thrust into a world of shifting fortunes, she adapts quickly to secure her place as one of the most powerful and longest-serving rulers in French history

programme.title: Bad Boys for Life

She sends him to recover the stash of money his father had hidden, as well as assassinating those responsible for his dads arrest - with Miami detective Mike Lowrey laston the hit list. Action sequel, starring Will Smith, Martin Lawrence, Paola Nunez and Vanessa Hudgens

programme.title: Vengeance

programme.title: Secrets of the Royals: Births, Marriages and Deaths
programme.desc: The story of a thousand years of monarchy told through milestones of royal families through the ages,, beginning by looking at the death and funeral of Queen Victoria, with biographer Shrabani Basu, author Stewart Richards and historian Lisa Hilton piecing together what went on behind palace walls. Historian Kate Williams tells the story of George IV, whose catastrophic wedding to Caroline of Brunswick went ahead even though hed already illegally married his mistress a decade before

programme.title: Katherine and Queen Elizabeth: A Special Relationship
programme.desc: A look at the bond between the Princess of Wales and Elizabeth II, the story of two women from different backgrounds and eras who were united by love, laughter, duty and compassion. This film unveils the private moments and public duties that brought them closer, revealing the mentorship and guidance the Queen provided to prepare Kate for her future as a Queen consort

programme.title: The Most Embarrassing TV Moments
programme.desc: A selection of TV cock-ups, mishaps and gaffes, including Richard Madeleys infamous impression of Ali G live on This Morning, Eamonn Holmess uncomfortable interview with taciturn magician David Blaine and the moment when Tom Cruise bounced like an excited child on Oprah Winfreys sofa. Plus, the moment when IT worker Guy Goma (at the BBC for a job interview) was mistaken for a journalist and put live on BBC News to discuss a complicated legal battle

programme.title: Britains Favourite 70s Sitcoms
programme.desc: A celebration of the funniest sitcoms of the 1970s, with a host of celebrity guests. Cameras reveal how Michael Crawford performed all his own slapstick stunts in Some Mothers Do Ave Em, and how the cast of The Good Life bonded over peapod burgundy. Theres also a look at how Fawlty Towers became a huge hit, and how a real-life love affair inspired Carla Lane to write suburban sitcom Butterflies. Featuring stand-out moments from The Last of The Summer Wine, The Liver Birds, The Fall and Rise of Reginald Perrin, Steptoe and Son, and Dads Army

programme.title: The 1970s Supermarket
programme.desc: As the supermarket scene of the 70s exploded, so did the ability for consumers to buy Christmas rather than make it. From artificial trees and plastic tinsel going on sale to the first-ever chocolate advent calendars hitting the shelves in 1971 and the new freezer stores packed with frozen turkey roasts, the decade saw a Christmas shopping revolution. In the kitchen, chef Rustie Lee rustles up vol-au-vents and Brussels pate, and tries out a Birds trifle kit, while in the lab, Dr Chris Clarke finds out why the cheesy filling inside a cheese football snack doesnt go off, how the gooey centre of an After Eight mint is created and why sprouts can give you wind

programme.title: Britains Favourite Christmas Adverts
programme.desc: Christmas: a time for giving - which is why advertisers pull out all the stops in a bid to persuade TV viewers to part with their hard-earned cash for the latest toys, gadgets, food, drink and whatever else they have to sell. This three-hour countdown recalls the advertising ghosts of past and present, 50 in total, from Action Man to Trivial Pursuit, the Stylophone to the Nintendo Wii, Paxo stuffing to Iceland platters and Hai Karate to Victoria Beckham Signature. With contributions from those who starred in the adverts and celebrities who were sufficiently convinced by the marketing messages to buy for their loved ones

Plus, an extra in an in-production advert suddenly finds himself under the spotlight as the Unexpected Star of the Show

programme.title: Everybody Loves Raymond
programme.desc: Ray is annoyed to discover Marie is plying his brother with gifts of scented candles and massage oils. However, his mood changes when he deduces her real motive - to put Robert in a romantic mood, in the hope he will provide her with grandchildren

programme.title: Everybody Loves Raymond
programme.desc: Amys brother Peter turns to Ray for advice on talking to women, while Debra decides to help out by throwing a party and inviting all her single friends

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One Where Rachels Sister Babysits
programme.desc: Christina Applegate reprises her role as Rachels clueless sister Amy, who offers to babysit Emma and ends up giving the unfortunate child a makeover. Phoebe inadvertently spoils Mikes anniversary surprise, and Joey writes a letter of recommendation for the Bings. Comedy, guest starring Christina Applegate and Paul Rudd

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Greg Kinnear guest stars as Charlies Nobel Prize-winning old flame, who is overseeing a grant Ross desperately wants. Rachel and Monica try to foist on each other one of Phoebes peculiar paintings. Comedy, guest starring Aisha Tyler (Archer) and Greg Kinnear (I Dont Know How She Does It)

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One with the Home Study
programme.desc: Ross discovers Rachel has an irrational fear of swings, while Phoebe and Mike argue about whether to give their wedding fund to charity. The Bings learn Joey had a one-night stand with the adoption worker handling their case, and worry he has ruined their chances

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One with the Late Thanksgiving
programme.desc: Monica reluctantly agrees to cook Thanksgiving dinner, but the others all turn up late, so she and Chandler angrily lock them out - until an unexpected phone call changes their mood completely

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One with the Birth Mother
programme.desc: Monica and Chandler travel to Ohio to meet the mother of the baby they plan to adopt. The pregnant mother, Erica, likes them but only because their files got mixed up with a doctor and a female minister. Meanwhile, Joey is set up on a date with one of Phoebes friends, but soon regrets it when she tries to take some food off his plate, and Ross has a fashion faux pas when he accidently wears womens clothing on a date

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One Where Chandler Gets Caught
programme.desc: Rachel and Phoebe see Chandler getting into a car with a mystery woman and follow them to a large house in the suburbs. They tell Monica of their fears and are shocked to hear the truth. Comedy, starring Jennifer Aniston, Lisa Kudrow and Matthew Perry

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One Where the Stripper Cries
programme.desc: Joey appears on quiz show The $100,000 Pyramid, but his disastrous efforts to answer the questions end up costing his partner the prize money. Meanwhile, the revellers at Phoebes hen party get a surprise once the stripper shows up. Guest starring Danny DeVito and Donny Osmond

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Phoebes big day arrives, but wedding planner Monica and stand-in father of the bride Joey take their roles a little too seriously. To make matters worse, a blizzard hits New York and one of Mikes ushers is indisposed, forcing Ross and Chandler to step into the breach

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One Where Joey Speaks French
programme.desc: Joey persuades Phoebe to teach him French for an important audition, while Monica and Chandler show a pregnant Erica the sights of New York and learn more about the babys possible father. Guest starring Anna Faris and Ron Leibman

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Rachel heads to a restaurant for a job interview, only to find herself sitting at a table within earshot of her current boss. Meanwhile, Monica and Chandler go house-hunting and Phoebe decides to change her name. Guest starring Paul Rudd and Dakota Fanning

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Phoebe learns Joeys agent has died, but he is so upset about his friends moving away that she decides not to tell him. Rachel worries about relocating to France, while Monica and Chandler are horrified to discover Janice is planning to buy the house next door to them. Guest starring Jane Lynch (Glee)

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One with Rachels Going Away Party
programme.desc: The gang throws a going-away party for Rachel, but she prefers to say her goodbyes individually - and one of her friends is left feeling hurt at being overlooked. Meanwhile, Monica supervises the packing for a new life in the suburbs with Chandler, while also keeping a close eye on the mother of their future adopted child

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The Last One (Parts One and Two)
programme.desc: Double bill. The last-ever episode of the comedy sees the pals facing major changes. There is a surprise in store for Monica and Chandler when Erica finally gives birth to the child they are planning to adopt, Phoebe and Mike decide to start a family of their own and Rachel gets set to begin a new life in Paris. Jennifer Aniston, Courteney Cox, Lisa Kudrow, Matt LeBlanc, Matthew Perry and David Schwimmer star

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: Pilot (The One Where Monica Gets a Room-mate)
programme.desc: The first-ever episode of the comedy, in which Rachel arrives at the local cafe after jilting her fiance at the altar. Chandler and Joey encourage Ross to enjoy bachelorhood when his lesbian wife walks out on him, while Phoebe supports herself playing guitar in the subway. Courteney Cox, Jennifer Aniston, David Schwimmer, Matthew Perry and Lisa Kudrow star

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One with the Sonogram at the End
programme.desc: Carol tells Ross she plans to raise his child with her lover Susan, but he can be involved if he wants. Ross and Monicas parents announce they are coming to dinner, while Rachel is aghast to discover her former fiance went on what would have been their honeymoon with her maid of honour

programme.title: Michael McIntyres Big Show

programme.title: 10 Things I Hate About You
programme.desc: Lively teenager Bianca is not allowed to start dating until her man-hating sister Kat does first - but no boy is brave enough to ask her out. However, Biancas would-be boyfriend thinks he has found the perfect man for the job in the shape of a quirky loner with a mysterious past. Comedy, based on Shakespeares The Taming of the Shrew, starring Heath Ledger, Julia Stiles, Joseph Gordon-Levitt and Larisa Oleynik

programme.title: The 40 Year-Old Virgin
programme.desc: A middle-aged shop worker reveals he has never been intimate with a woman, which prompts his shocked colleagues to set him up with a series of potentially passionate dates. When he falls for a single mother, his friends think he is right on course for a lusty liaison, but his new partner is not ready for a physical relationship. Judd Apatows comedy, starring Steve Carell, Catherine Keener and Paul Rudd

programme.title: Kevin Bridges - The Story Continues
programme.desc: The Glaswegian comedian returns to his home town as part of his 2012 tour, performing to a sell-out crowd at the SECC Arena with his usual blend of social commentary, astute observations and sharp one-liners

programme.title: Jimmy Carrs Am I the A**hole?
programme.desc: GK Barry, Jamali Maddix and the host pass judgement on a man who dumped his mum while on holiday and someone with a rather dubious ick

programme.desc: An extended edition of the irreverent panel show first shown during the Queens Diamond Jubilee in 2012. Jimmy Carr hosts alongside regular team captains Sean Lock and Jon Richardson, plus guests Sarah Millican, Miles Jupp, Chris Kamara and Jennie Bond

programme.title: Bradley and Barney Walsh: Breaking Dad
programme.desc: Bradley is on the mend following his rodeo injury and determined to get back behind the wheel of the RV. As the pair continue on their journey, Barney is thrilled to be celebrating his birthday with a trip to the iconic Niagara Falls. Later, Bradley and Barney take the RV on a small cargo ferry as they head to Vermont. Here, the pair have a go at ice climbing, which proves treacherous for them and the crew, before a spot of dog sledding through the frozen wilderness and an inevitable race through the forests

programme.title: Bradley and Barney Walsh: Breaking Dad
programme.desc: On the final leg of their journey, the pair continue through the snow to New Hampshire. Here, they meet rally-driving champion Tim ONeil who gives them a crash course in driving in the ice and snow before they take on an intense time trial. The pair travel on to Maine, where they take part in some wilderness training, before bidding farewell to the RV and heading out into the extremely choppy seas for some lobster fishing. Before heading home, the pair look back on some of their favourite moments from the trip

programme.desc: Chandler begins a relationship with a married woman, Ross tries to liven up his conservative image and Joey lands a film role with a difference - as a naked body-double for Al Pacino

programme.desc: Chandlers flamboyant mother breezes into town for an appearance on The Jay Leno Show to talk about her career as a writer of erotic fiction - and throws her embarrassed son into a panic by inviting everyone out to dinner. Featuring Lee and Jenny, Marcus and Mica, the Malones, the Siddiquis, and Simon and Jane watching and talking about hits from the festive season, including classic movies, exciting new dramas and some of TVs biggest traditional treats

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: After a mould issue at home forces Erica and Geoff to stay at the Goldbergs, Beverly senses tensions in their marriage and seizes the opportunity to impart a little marital advice

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: Beverly is not coping well with the idea of an empty nest as Adams graduation day approaches, while Erica decides to try out as a back-up singer

programme.title: Ramsays Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Gordon Ramsay heads to Arvada, Colorado, where a husband and wife have allowed their restaurant to fall into disrepair. Randys hoarding is out of control, while Alexa, who runs the kitchen, has a lot to learn. To make matters worse, the Old Neighborhood is one of the filthiest eateries the fiery chef has ever seen, and only one of the biggest transformations of the series can save the business

programme.title: Hollyoaks Omnibus
programme.desc: The walls are closing in on Lucas, Dodger struggles to hide his emotions at work and decides to confide in Donny, and Dianes shocked by what she finds on her sons phone. A family is torn apart, Tony begins his physio sessions with Mercedes support, and with the truth now revealed, tension rises between two residents

programme.title: Rude(ish) Tube
programme.desc: Featuring a variety of cats doing strange things, soldiers stuck in the sand and a dog balancing on a rope

programme.title: Dora and the Lost City of Gold
programme.desc: Having spent most of her life exploring the jungle with her parents, nothing could prepare Dora for her most dangerous adventure ever - high school. Always the explorer, Dora quickly finds herself leading Boots (her best friend, a monkey), Diego, a mysterious jungle inhabitant and a rag tag group of teens on a live-action adventure to save her parents and solve the impossible mystery behind a lost city of gold. Live-action adaptation of the hit animated kids show, starring Isabela Merced, Eva Longoria and Jeff Wahlberg

programme.title: Monster House
programme.desc: A boy becomes obsessed with a sinister elderly neighbour living in a creepy old house. On Halloween night, he and two friends discover the chilling truth - the house is alive and eats anything that comes too close, including children. Animated comedy horror, with the voices of Mitchel Musso, Sam Lerner, Spencer Locke, Steve Buscemi, Maggie Gyllenhaal and Jason Lee

programme.title: Ramsays Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Gordon Ramsay heads to Queens, New York, where he meets a family torn apart by the stress of running failing Greek restaurant Kati Allo. Husband-and-wife owners Manny and Christine are on the brink of divorce, while their daughter Evelyn is caught in the middle and at her wits end

programme.title: Ramsays Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Part one of two. Gordon Ramsay comes to the aid of Mangia Mangia, an Italian restaurant with an identity crisis in Woodland Park, Colorado, where guests have a choice between casual fine-dining service or a pick-up from the drive-through takeaway. Hard-nosed owner Julie finds herself completely at odds with the head chef, forcing her to breaking point

programme.title: Ramsays Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Gordon Ramsay concludes his two-part challenge at Mangia Mangia in Woodland Park, Colorado. In order to save the struggling Italian restaurant from disaster, he must persuade harassed owner Julie to co-operate with the head chef, and work his magic on a menu that relies heavily on a microwave

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Pilot episode of the comedy about scientists and their friendship with a down-to-earth neighbour. When aspiring actress Penny moves into Leonards apartment block, he is immediately smitten, but Sheldon warns him that he runs the risk of a broken heart if he tries to woo her. Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons and Kaley Cuoco star

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon helps Leonard drop off a parcel for Penny, but when he sees how messy her flat is, he tries to do a good deed - which is not well received. Johnny Gale, Jim Parsons and Kaley Cuoco star

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon discovers a surprise screening of The Avengers is scheduled at a local cinema, complete with a QandA session with the films director, Joss Whedon. However, the event just happens to clash with time hed planned to spend with Amy, so he decides to pay Stuart to be his subtitute for the afternoon while he and the other boys immerse themselves in Marvel superheroics. Meanwhile, Leonards mother Beverly arrives in town for an extended visit, and Penny takes the opportunity to bond with her new mother-in-law - and to make up for not inviting her to the wedding. Comedy, guest starring Christine Baranski

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Conflict arises when Leonards newly divorced parents and Sheldons devoutly religious mother are all in town at the same time. And when Howard and Raj are contacted about the guidance system theyve developed, they assume that the government is out to get them. Laurie Metcalf, Christine Baranski and Judd Hirsch guest star

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The friends struggle through an awkward morning after Sheldons mother and Leonards father share an evening together. Pennys family arrives in town to attend Penny and Leonards second wedding ceremony. Keith Carradine, Laurie Metcalf, Christine Baranski and Judd Hirsch guest star

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Howard has a meeting with Colonel Williams, a representative from the US air forces department of material command, about the gyroscope he invented with Leonard and Sheldon. Penny accidentally reveals that Bernadette is pregnant to their colleagues at work. Dean Norris guest stars

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Tensions rise when the guys struggle to complete their Air Force project on time and are forced to work around the clock - leaving Sheldon fighting to stay awake. Penny and Amy attend a university gathering at the home of Bert the geologist. Raj learns Bernadettes true feelings about her pregnancy when he helps her to clear out the spare room for a nursery

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Howard and Bernadette decide they do not want to know the gender of their unborn child, but are upset when they hear Raj has found out before they have. After Amys apartment floods, she proposes a cohabitation experiment with Sheldon to stay with him while her apartment undergoes repairs

programme.title: The Great British Bake Off
programme.sub-title: The Great New Year Bake Off 2022
programme.desc: Paul Hollywood, Prue Leith, Matt Lucas and Noel Fielding are joined by four contestants from past series, who tackle a series of three seasonal challenges. Returning to the tent are Kim-Joy and Jon from the 2018 run, and Hermine and Rowan, who competed in the first series filmed under Covid quarantine bubble conditions in 2020

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: The family hears about Grampas time in the Air Force, and when Milhouses Dutch cousin Annika pops by, Bart takes up smoking to impress her. Featuring the guest voice of Game of Thrones Carice van Houten

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Marge convinces the town to pass anti-bullying legislation after Bart gets picked on at the school dance. Homer then gets arrested and sent to rehab for targeting Ned Flanders, only to subsequently leave the facility as a hero

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: When a modernised Springfield Elementary School has a technical meltdown, Lisa does her best to transform it into a different institution. During the process, Groundskeeper Willie coaches her and the other members of the Mathlympics team for an important maths quiz against their Waverly Hill rivals

programme.title: Mission: Impossible - Rogue Nation
programme.desc: The team of secret agents faces being shut down when the head of the CIA convinces the US Senate that it is too dangerous. The operatives of the Impossible Mission Force become fugitives when they defy orders and plot to bring down a shadowy society of assassins. Spy thriller sequel, starring Tom Cruise, Jeremy Renner, Rebecca Ferguson and Simon Pegg

programme.title: Naked Attraction
programme.desc: Twenty-one-year-old Dom from Hampshire has been nominated for the show by his mum, in a desperate attempt to break his dismal dating record. Dom wants to find a partner who shares his love of adventure and isnt bothered by his posh boy charm. Theres also 22-year-old pansexual Izzy, who is open to dating any gender, but with so much on offer, will she make the right choice?

programme.title: Gogglebox
programme.desc: Highlights from the first 10 years of the show, looking back at how a nation survived lockdowns, a revolving door of prime ministers, and Ed Balls dancing Gangnam Style on Strictly. Featuring appearances by old faces Steph and Dom, Leon and June, and Sandra and Sandi, current armchair critics Pete and Sophie, Mary and Giles, Jenny and Lee, and the Siddiquis, who have been on Gogglebox since it all started

programme.title: Gogglebox
programme.desc: The armchair critics share their opinions on the state funeral of Elizabeth II, and also offer insightful and passionate takes on The Masked Dancer, Frozen Planet II, Bad Sisters, The Grand Tour: A Scandi Flick, Secret Crush and BBC News. From September 2022

programme.title: First Dates
programme.desc: Science technician Ian has a date with shy nursery nurse Stacie and glamorous 22-year-old dental nurse Cece is looking for someone who can see that beauty is more than skin deep. Aldine, 42, has been engaged five times without ever making it down the aisle and project manager Paul, 38, is looking for a woman with a bit of spirit, but could Aldine be a bit too much for him to handle?

programme.title: The Neighborhood
programme.desc: When Tina struggles to keep up with her job at Calvins garage due to her burgeoning baking business, he faces a tough decision

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: A chance to buy goods from the comfort of home

programme.title: Life
programme.desc: The strategies adopted by plants that enable them to grow in every possible environment, even where there is no sunlight, water or nutrients. Featuring the dragons blood tree, which survives in the desert by converting moisture found in the mist and shading its own roots, the carnivorous Venus flytrap that has evolved into an extraordinary predator able to digest insects, and the cats claw creeper, which uses other plants as a ladder to reach sunlight. Narrated by David Attenborough

programme.title: Life
programme.desc: The focus turns to apes and monkeys, revealing their similarities to humans. Large armies of hamadryas baboons battle on the plains of Ethiopia to steal females and settle old scores, while Japanese macaques beat the cold by lounging in thermal springs. An orang-utan baby fails in its struggle to make an umbrella out of leaves, and capuchins try to smash nuts with a large rock. Narrated by David Attenborough

programme.title: Planet Earth
programme.desc: David Attenborough narrates the documentary exploring Earths natural history and the factors that have affected it. The first edition examines how the sun affects life on Earth through the seasons, following a polar bear preparing its cubs for a long journey to avoid becoming stranded on floating glaciers. Narrated by David Attenborough

programme.title: Planet Earth
programme.desc: A tour of the mightiest rivers in the world, from the deep waters of Siberias Lake Baikal, home to the worlds only freshwater seal, to the wetlands downstream of Earths tallest waterfall patrolled by frenzied piranhas. There is also footage of the lightning-quick ambush of wildebeest by crocodiles in Africa and macaque monkeys swimming underwater to catch crabs in Indonesia. Presented by David Attenborough

programme.title: Life
programme.desc: The strategies adopted by plants that enable them to grow in every possible environment, even where there is no sunlight, water or nutrients. Featuring the dragons blood tree, which survives in the desert by converting moisture found in the mist and shading its own roots, the carnivorous Venus flytrap that has evolved into an extraordinary predator able to digest insects, and the cats claw creeper, which uses other plants as a ladder to reach sunlight. programme.title: Yes Minister
programme.desc: Jim is saddled with the impossible job of developing his governments integrated national transport policy. Anthony Jay and Jonathan Lynns comedy, starring Paul Eddington and Nigel Hawthorne

programme.title: Yes Minister
programme.desc: Hacker courageously puts his ministerial career in the balance by deciding to inform the prime minister of British arms sales to Italian terrorists. Sir Humphrey launches a frantic damage-limitation exercise to ensure vested interests arent compromised. Political comedy, with Paul Eddington and Nigel Hawthorne

programme.title: Yes Minister
programme.desc: Sir Humphrey is horrified when Jim decides to support the sale of an art gallery to save the football club in his constituency from going under. Comedy, starring Paul Eddington and Nigel Hawthorne

programme.title: Yes, Prime Minister
programme.desc: On his arrival at Number 10, Jim Hacker is confronted by a confusing nuclear deterrent problem, made more difficult by Sir Humphreys constant meddling. The new PM soon realises his powers do not stretch to domestic affairs. Political comedy, starring Paul Eddington and Nigel Hawthorne

programme.title: Yes, Prime Minister
programme.desc: Jim Hacker prepares to make his first public broadcast as prime minister, but finds it is not so easy to speak to camera as he imagined. John Wells guest stars, alongside Paul Eddington and Nigel Hawthorne

programme.title: Yes, Prime Minister
programme.desc: Hacker attempts to gain support for his tax cuts - by threatening to raise the duty on tobacco. Political comedy, starring Paul Eddington and Nigel Hawthorne

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: A chance to buy goods from the comfort of home

programme.title: Lost Land of the Tiger
programme.desc: The expedition shifts to high altitude in the mountains of Bhutan as Gordon Buchanan captures footage of a snow leopard cub at more than 5,000m, while his heat-sensing camera picks up a big cat stalking through the camp in darkness. Steve Backshall treks to Tiger Mountain along the Tibetan border, where a remote tribe helps provide a close encounter with an elusive predator. As the expedition concludes, the team presents its findings to the Bhutanese prime minister

programme.title: Lost Land of the Jaguar
programme.desc: Scientists, climbers and wildlife film-makers explore the rainforests of Guyana, a former British colony in South America. Cameraman Gordon Buchanan finds giant otters almost as large as he is, canopy expert Justine Evans observes a family of red howler monkeys, and biologist Steve Backshall probes a habitat below a massive waterfall where frogs and freshwater crabs happily co-exist

programme.title: Lost Land of the Jaguar
programme.desc: The team travels deeper into the Guyanan jungle and scorpions and poisonous centipedes enter the base camp. Gordon Buchanan discovers an animal is stealing supplies and Steve Backshall finds giant piranha and long-fanged sabretooth fish in the river. Meanwhile, George McGavin catches an enormous tarantula and the climbing team tries to scale a huge unclimbed mountain at the forests edge

programme.title: Lost Land of the Jaguar
programme.desc: Steve Backshall reaches the summit of a table-top mountain, after climbing a vertical cliff face nearly as high as the Empire State Building. Meanwhile, Dr George McGavin and Gordon Buchanan have to haul three boats and all their kit through the jungle after finding the rapids of the Rewa River impassable. At the end of the journey, George presents a report on the expedition to the President of Guyana, Bharrat Jagdeo

programme.title: Lost Land of the Tiger
programme.desc: The expedition shifts to high altitude in the mountains of Bhutan as Gordon Buchanan captures footage of a snow leopard cub at more than 5,000m, while his heat-sensing camera picks up a big cat stalking through the camp in darkness. programme.title: Top of the Pops
programme.desc: Jo Whiley presents the pop chart programme, first broadcast on 21 November 1997. Featuring Errol Brown, Ocean Colour Scene, Hanson, Pulp, Conner Reeves, Metallica, All Saints and Aqua

programme.title: Top of the Pops
programme.desc: Mark Lamarr presents the pop chart programme, first broadcast on 28 November 1997. Featuring Louise, Robert Miles and Kathy Sledge, Mary J Blige, Steven Houghton, Teletubbies, All Saints, Errol Brown and various artists performing the Children in Need charity single Perfect Day

programme.title: Top of the Pops
programme.desc: Jayne Middlemiss presents the pop chart programme, first broadcast on December 5, 1997. Featuring M People, Kylie Minogue, The Verve, Todd Terry, Paul Weller, Gala, Boyzone and various artists performing the Children in Need charity single Perfect Day

programme.title: Top of the Pops
programme.desc: Jo Whiley presents the pop chart programme, first broadcast on 12 December 1997. Featuring Janet Jackson, The Seahorses, Robbie Williams, Sheryl Crow, Blackstreet, Five, All Saints and Teletubbies

programme.title: The SpongeBob Movie: Sponge Out of Water
programme.desc: The cheery sea creature tries to prevent a precious secret formula from falling into the wrong hands - but when it goes missing, the end of the world approaches. SpongeBob and his friends embark on a quest to get it back, which leads to them developing superpowers and venturing onto dry land. Animated comedy, with the voices of Tom Kenny and Antonio Banderas

programme.title: Think Like a Dog
programme.desc: A 12-year-old tech prodigys science experiment goes awry and he forges a telepathic connection with his dog. The duo join forces and use their unique perspectives on life to overcome complications of family and school. Family comedy drama, starring Josh Duhamel, Megan Fox and Gabriel Bateman

programme.title: Mysterious Island
programme.desc: Soldiers escaping the American Civil War take flight in a giant observation balloon and land far away on a strange uncharted island, where they encounter giant creatures, cut-throat pirates, two shipwrecked Englishwomen - and the mysterious Captain Nemo. Sci-fi adventure based on Jules Vernes novel, starring Michael Craig, Herbert Lom, Joan Greenwood and Michael Callan, with special effects by Ray Harryhausen

programme.title: Enemy Mine
programme.desc: In the midst of a war between humans and aliens, two space pilots from opposite sides are marooned together on an inhospitable planet and are forced to set aside their mutual animosity to survive. Sci-fi adventure, starring Dennis Quaid, Louis Gossett Jr and Brion James

programme.title: Men in Black: International
programme.desc: The intergalactic law enforcers have always protected the Earth from the scum of the universe. This time they tackle their biggest threat - a mole in the Men in Black organisation. Director F Gary Grays fantasy sequel, starring Chris Hemsworth, Tessa Thompson and Rebecca Ferguson

programme.title: Nobody
programme.desc: A quiet and unassuming family man slowly reveals his true character after his house is burgled by two petty thieves. The aftermath of the incident ignites his long-simmering rage, triggering dormant instincts and propelling him on a brutal path that brings to the surface dark secrets and lethal skills. Crime drama, starring Bob Odenkirk, Connie Nielsen and Aleksey Serebryakov

programme.title: Monster Hunter
programme.desc: When Cpt Artemis and her loyal soldiers are transported to a new world, they engage in a desperate battle for survival against enormous enemies with incredible powers. Fantasy adventure based on the video game, starring Milla Jovovich, Tony Jaa and Ron Perlman

programme.title: Film4 Interview Programmes
programme.desc: Stars and directors talk about the experience of making movies in this compendium of personal and practical reflections

programme.title: Anaconda
programme.desc: Film-makers venture deep into the Amazon jungle to document the lives of a remote tribe. However, the expedition is hijacked by a crazed hunter who plans to use them as bait to catch a gigantic killer snake. Adventure, starring Jennifer Lopez, Jon Voight, Ice Cube, Eric Stoltz and Jonathan Hyde

programme.title: It Should Happen to You
programme.desc: A publicity-seeking actress with an urge to be famous comes up with a plan to make a name for herself. She rents a billboard in New York with her name and picture on it, and soon becomes an overnight sensation - despite not actually being famous for anything. Meanwhile, a wealthy playboy becomes infatuated with her, to the consternation of her film-maker boyfriend. Comedy, starring Judy Holliday, Peter Lawford and Jack Lemmon in his screen debut

programme.title: The Muppets Take Manhattan
programme.desc: Kermit, Miss Piggy, Fozzie Bear and company try to take Broadway by storm with their college show, setting the stage for a host of misadventures as they yearn for stardom in the Big Apple and set out to raise the money to finance their production. Comedy, performed by Jim Henson and Frank Oz, with appearances by Liza Minnelli, Art Carney, Dabney Coleman, Gregory Hines, Joan Rivers, Brooke Shields, Linda Lavin and Elliott Gould

programme.title: Patrick
programme.desc: A young womans chaotic life becomes more complicated when she inherits her grandmothers dog. Comedy, starring Beattie Edmondson, Ed Skrein, Jennifer Saunders and Cherie Lunghi

programme.title: Sister Act
programme.desc: Nightclub singer Deloris Van Cartier agrees to testify against her gangster boyfriend after witnessing a murder. Placed in protective custody by the authorities, she is less than pleased to discover she is expected to pose as chaste nun Sister Mary Clarence in a convent. Comedy, starring Whoopi Goldberg, Harvey Keitel, Maggie Smith, Bill Nunn and Kathy Najimy

programme.title: Sister Act 2: Back in the Habit
programme.desc: A cabaret singer who once hid out in a convent is reunited with the nuns she befriended, who now need her help. She poses as a member of the order once more and joins the staff of a Catholic school threatened with closure, where she aims to make a success of the resident choir. Comedy sequel, starring Whoopi Goldberg, Kathy Najimy, Lauryn Hill, Maggie Smith and James Coburn

programme.title: Ghost Rider
programme.desc: Motorcycle stuntman Johnny Blaze sells his soul to diabolical Mephistopheles to save the life of his father. His bargain dooms him to pass each night as Ghost Rider, a demonic skeletal biker bound to take evil souls to Hell. However, conflict between Mephistopheles and his son offers Johnny the chance to win back his humanity. Fantasy thriller based on the comic-book, starring Nicolas Cage, Eva Mendes and Wes Bentley

programme.title: The Last of the Mohicans
programme.desc: An orphaned settler in North America is adopted by the last member of a native tribe following the death of his family. The child grows to become legendary frontiersman Hawkeye, who rescues and falls in love with a British officers daughter during the Anglo-French War. However, a bitter Huron war chief is determined to take revenge against her father by killing her. Michael Manns historical adventure, based on James Fenimore Coopers classic tale, starring Daniel Day-Lewis, Madeleine Stowe, Russell Means, Wes Studi, Maurice Roeves and Eric Schweig

programme.title: Black Sea
programme.desc: A submarine captain working for a salvage company is laid off, and attempts to turn his fortunes around by recovering a lost treasure rumoured to have sunk to the depths of the Black Sea. However, greed, desperation and claustrophobia cause the members of his crew to turn against each other. Thriller, starring Jude Law and Jodie Whittaker

Western, starring Kirk Douglas, Walter Matthau, Elsa Martinelli and Lon Chaney Jr

However, they have to contend with saboteurs planning to prevent California becoming part of the Union. Western, starring Charlton Heston, Forrest Tucker, Rhonda Fleming and Jan Sterling

programme.title: Will Penny
programme.desc: An ageing cowboy takes a job on a ranch, driving off trespassers from the owners land. However, when he finds a woman and his son hiding out in a cabin, he takes pity on them and allows them to stay. But as an attraction develops between them, a bandit the cowboy had crossed in the past comes looking for him. Western, starring Charlton Heston, Joan Hackett and Donald Pleasence

programme.title: Deadly Affairs
programme.desc: The case of a Florida emergency services dispatcher who found himself in a whirlwind romance with a flight attendant. programme.title: James Martins Great British Adventure
programme.desc: Still in Hampshire, James views ex-formula one racer Jody Scheckters epic car collection, and learns of his passion for buffalo mozzarella, which he makes in his dairy. James uses some of the cheese in his buffalo mozzarella, blackberry and beetroot salad, before crossing into Sussex to don fancy dress and experience the Goodwood Revival, which celebrates motorsport from the 1940s to the 1960s. The presenter offers a classic comfort recipe - roast pork with black pudding fritters and caramelised apples as he prepares to watch some of his friends race in the Goodwood Revival TT race

programme.title: Love Your Garden

Can the Irish maestro pull off another late charge and etch his name even deeper into racing folklore?

programme.title: Midsomer Murders

With Neil Dudgeon, Neil McCaul, Sharon Small, Marc Elliott and Arabella Weir

programme.title: Midsomer Murders

programme.sub-title: The Wolf Hunter of Little Worthy

programme.title: Vera
programme.desc: Cleaner Luke Sumners body is discovered close to his flat in Newcastle, but pathology concludes that the killing blow could have occurred several hours before he succumbed to his injuries, prompting Vera to piece together the victims final hours in order to investigate his murder. But Luke lived a simple life and had even severed all ties to the quaint rural village where he grew up - including his mother Carmel. Can she shed any light on her sons murder?

programme.title: Vera
programme.desc: Wealthy betting shop tycoon Alun Wilmott is shot and killed during a home invasion, leaving his wife and daughter traumatised - with large amounts of cash missing from his personal safe, it is assumed he is the unlucky victim of a burglary. Vera suspects an inside job in the shape of Aluns head of private security, Ciaran Duggan, whose history of violent crime calls his reformed character into question. Can the team find the evidence to pin the crime on their prime suspect - or are they looking in the wrong place? programme.title: Downton Abbey
programme.desc: Preparations are under way for Roses wedding, but family tensions on both sides threaten to derail proceedings. Denker reveals an unexpected side to her personality, which causes trouble for more than one of the servants. With the war memorial due to be unveiled, Mrs Patmore is still upset, but Robert has something up his sleeve. Branson comes to a heart-wrenching decision, and the storm clouds that have been gathering over Anna and Bates finally burst

programme.title: Downton Abbey
programme.desc: Its the early autumn of 1924 and Roses father-in-law Lord Sinderby has rented Brancaster Castle in Northumberland and invited the Crawleys to a grouse-shooting party. However, the Sinderbys butler Stowell (guest star Alun Armstrong, New Tricks) has an axe to grind and a scandalous secret threatens to derail the holiday. Back at Downton, the servants hold the fort and unlikely later-life romances abound, while Bates takes drastic measures to clear Annas name as she faces an uncertain future behind bars. The seasons change and another Christmas is enjoyed at the Abbey, where a heartbreaking farewell and a joyful reunion take place. Feature-length festive special, starring Hugh Bonneville, Maggie Smith, James Faulkner, Penny Downie, Joanne Froggatt and Brendan Coyle

programme.title: Downton Abbey

programme.title: Downton Abbey
programme.desc: Plans for the wedding are gathering steam, but Lady Marys meddling lands Carson in trouble with Mrs Hughes. programme.desc: The young detective is suspended from duty following a recent case. programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Dog enthusiast Karen hosts the third night of a week of dinner parties in Kent, hoping to impress her guests by serving up a menu inspired by her four-legged friends. After the cheesy fun of the previous night, she is determined to impress her guests

programme.desc: The documentary following life inside an AandE department returns for its first series outside London - at the Queens Medical Centre, Nottingham.
