programme.title: Secret Nazi Science
programme.desc: How the Nazis used science to study human constitution and its limits, from mundane questions of survival to creating a stronger and better soldier

programme.title: JFK: One Day in America
programme.desc: Documentary exploring the assassination of the president, and the aftermath. The first episode focuses on the shooting itself, and Kennedy being pronounced dead

programme.title: JFK: One Day in America
programme.desc: The race is on to find JFKs killer, who swiftly strikes again. Jackie Kennedy, still wearing her bloodstained dress, returns JFKs body and sees LBJ being sworn in

programme.title: JFK: One Day in America
programme.desc: Lee Harvey Oswald is charged with JFKs murder, but the world is shocked when Oswald himself is shot dead. With no reckoning, will America ever be the same?

programme.title: Ice Road Rescue
programme.desc: Bjoern plans a high-risk rescue when an overturned tanker blocks the road. He needs Thords help, but hes challenged to raise a boat thats sunk into the fjord

programme.title: Britains Underworld
programme.desc: The life of Liverpools Curtis Cocky Warren, examining the way he made his money in drugs and how he came to be featured on the Sunday Times Rich List

programme.title: Air Crash Investigation
programme.desc: The loss of Adam Air Flight 574, which disappeared from radar screens in 2007 and crashed into the Java Sea, off Indonesia, killing 102 people on board

programme.title: Air Crash Investigation
programme.desc: An American plane crash in the last days of the Vietnam War in 1974 that killed more than 250 people, including Vietnamese orphans being airlifted to safety. Investigators had to battle looters in order to safeguard the wreckage, hoping to determine the cause of the disaster

programme.title: Air Crash Investigation
programme.desc: The inquiry into the crash of American Eagle Flight 4184 near Roselawn, Indiana, in 1994, which killed all 68 people on board

programme.title: Air Crash Investigation
programme.desc: The 1985 Manchester runway disaster, in which an aircrafts engine failed, causing the deaths of 55 people

programme.title: Ice Road Rescue
programme.desc: Thord and Erlend are spooked while trying to rescue a van beside a graveyard, and Bjoern gives rookie Jan Erik a lesson in becoming a proper rescuer

programme.title: Ice Road Rescue
programme.desc: Thord tries to tow out a car that crashed into a field after a snowstorm, while a driver steers his truck off the road to avoid a collision in the north

programme.title: Ice Road Rescue
programme.desc: Bjoern plans a high-risk rescue when an overturned tanker blocks the road. He needs Thords help, but hes challenged to raise a boat thats sunk into the fjord

programme.title: Toronto Airport Uncovered
programme.desc: Frozen planes, an injured flight attendant, and a drunk trespasser keep the team on their toes as freezing weather hits the airport

programme.title: Top Guns: The Next Generation
programme.desc: A students dreams are challenged during advanced bombing training. High-speed dives lead to dangerous errors, prompting stern instructor feedback to maintain safety

programme.title: Top Guns: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Landing on an aircraft carrier demands precision flying and is a skill vital for all US Navy fighter pilots. As the students tackle the longest and most technical section of the advanced phase, they know its a test they must pass to keep their dreams alive. The pressure mounts on some struggling students, and the commanding officer issues a timely warning to one

programme.title: Miracle Landing on the Hudson
programme.desc: Documentary charting how US Airways Flight 1549 was forced to land on New Yorks Hudson River in 2009 when a flock of geese flew into both of the planes engines. The impact of the landing ripped a hole in the bottom of the aircraft, and water began to rise in the cabin. Includes interviews with passengers, who reflect on the heroism of the pilot, and the efforts of local boat owners to rescue them from the icy waters

programme.title: Air Crash Investigation
programme.desc: The case of a plane that flew into a massive storm over Indonesia during the countrys rainy season, but made a seemingly impossible emergency landing with only one casualty

programme.title: Air Crash Investigation
programme.desc: Aviation experts contemplate the possibility that airlines could be putting lives at risk by using out-of-date statistics to calculate passengers average weight

programme.title: Construction Fails
programme.desc: Asbestos was a product that seemed too good to be true - because it was. Meanwhile, in New York, two buildings explode sending debris flying through the streets

programme.title: Hidden Histories
programme.desc: Historian James Holland explores key events of the Second World War, beginning with the battle of Monte Cassino, where Polish troops displaced by the Nazi and Soviet invasions of their homeland marched south to take a position that had defied all Allied offensives for the previous four months

programme.title: Tuts Treasures: Hidden Secrets
programme.desc: King Tuts death mask undergoes a forensic investigation as experts seek an answer to one of the biggest mysteries surrounding the famous treasure

programme.title: Lost Treasures of Egypt
programme.desc: Archaeologists explore the final days of the pharaohs, revealing how power struggles influenced the fate of one of the worlds greatest civilisations

programme.title: Hitler Youth
programme.desc: Part one of two. The story of the Nazi youth organisation, which was used to indoctrinate German boys in the 1930s and prepare them for the war Hitler was planning

programme.title: Hitler Youth
programme.desc: Part two of two. A look at the expansion of the organisation in the build-up to war, and the efforts of the Allies to counter the indoctrination of captured Nazi soldiers

programme.title: Nazi Megastructures
programme.desc: Compilation of highlights concerned with the machinery of air warfare, including bombs, torpedoes and kamikaze planes

programme.title: Trafficked with Mariana Van Zeller
programme.desc: The reporter travels to the Amazon to track down the criminal networks behind a slew of killings and the illegal destruction of the rainforest

programme.title: Trafficked with Mariana Van Zeller
programme.desc: As much as 30 percent of our seafood has been caught illegally. Mariana searches for the fish pirates who make billions each year while destroying our oceans

programme.title: The Infinite Explorer with Hannah Fry
programme.desc: Hannah decodes the Parthenons geometry, sails the Aegean with ancient tools, and attends a flour-throwing festival that blends ancient myth with modern identity

programme.title: Strangest Things
programme.sub-title: Bog Body, Abrams Machine, Bust of Nefertiti
programme.desc: A body found perfectly preserved in a Danish bog, a bust of Nefertiti, and a strange machine used to identify disease

programme.title: Air Crash Investigation
programme.desc: Reconstructing the landing at sea of a passenger jet flying from Italy to Tunisia in 2005, which was forced to ditch after successive engine failures. Miraculously there were survivors, and the investigation that followed led to criminal charges against nine men for criminal negligence

programme.title: Air Crash Investigation
programme.desc: The events in 1987 that caused a flight leaving Detroit to crash onto a road during take-off, killing all but one of its passengers

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: Plankton is frustrated that people think hes cute in Say Awww!, then in Patrick the Mailman, Patrick crushes the mailman, so he and SpongeBob deliver the mail around Bikini Bottom

programme.title: Sonic Prime
programme.desc: The wise-cracking blue hedgehog, made famous by a series of popular video games on Sega consoles, continues his computer-animated adventures through the Shatterverse. At the end of the first series, the eponymous spiny mammal (voiced by Deven Mack) learnt from black hedgehog Shadow (Ian Hanlin) that the original version of Green Hill no longer exists. Sonic is trapped in a multiverse of mayhem with different iterations of his friends Amy Rose (Shannon Chan-Kent), Knuckles (Adam Nurada), Rouge (Kazumi Evans) and Tails (Ashleigh Ball). Sonic and Shadow must put aside their differences and work together to repair the temporal damage and outwit diabolical scientist Dr Eggman (Brian Drummond)

programme.title: Tales of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: The heroes in a half shell come to terms with their new roles as saviours of New York City in an animated series set shortly after the events chronicled in the film Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Mutant Mayhem. Donatello (voiced by Micah Abbey), Leonardo (Nicolas Cantu), Michelangelo (Shamon Brown Jr) and Raphael (Brady Noon) experience the usual growing pains of teenagers while contending with the media spotlight. Building on their friendship with aspiring reporter April ONeil (Ayo Edebiri), the reptilian quartet face brilliant inventor Bishop (Alanna Ubach), who believes mutants are the greatest danger facing humankind and must be eliminated. Meanwhile, pampered rich kid Rod (Pete Davison) yearns to be a mutant and leverages his wealth and connections to achieve a dangerous dream

programme.desc: Tony Towers, a successful nightclub manager and local celebrity, embarks upon the 3:17 to Nottingham for a Christmas family reunion in 1985, but things soon get a little strange. Moving up a carriage to the buffet car lands him in 1995, where he finds his clubs have failed and his life has fallen apart. Tony discovers that by moving up and down this fateful train, he can transport himself forward and backward to various stages of his life. Not only that, but the actions he takes in one carriage directly affect his life in the next. Festive drama, starring Michael Sheen and Nathalie Emmanuel

programme.desc: JoJo and Gran Gran spot a birds nest in Cynthias garden, which inspires JoJo to make a nest for Panda. Gran Gran has a plan: while JoJo waits for the eggs they found to hatch, they can go to the park and see all the ducklings that have already hatched out and about! programme.title: Andrew Trimble: For Ulster and Ireland
programme.desc: The former rugby star explores Ulster-Scots roots and his experiences of growing up in Northern Ireland. He attempts to answer the question of if its possible for different cultures, traditions, loyalties and identities to co-exist peacefully on this island. With his father he traces his roots back to pre-Cromwellian times in Scotland, before the original family name and in a field in Dromore, Andrew attends his first ever Orange Parade

On the same stretch of Welsh coast, the Llandudno and Rhyl lifeboats are involved in a desperate search for a fishing vessel thats reported missing

programme.title: Earth
programme.desc: Chris Packham tells the story of the event 800 million years ago when almost the entire planet froze and the chances of life surviving hung in the balance. Earths journey into the deep freeze started with fire when the giant supercontinent Rodinia broke up and vast powerful tectonic forces ripped the land apart, kicking off a series of events that resulted in huge amounts of carbon dioxide being sucked from the atmosphere - sending global temperatures plummeting

They are constantly on guard against the harpy, while black caimans nest on the banks of the rivers, sharing their habitat with the giant otters

programme.title: The Americas
programme.desc: Behind the scenes on the nature series, revealing how the production team faced challenges that ranged from trekking through corrosive waters 14,000 feet up in the Andes to weathering Amazonian lightning storms. programme.title: The Guest Wing
programme.desc: At Northumberlands Chillingham Castle, Sir Humphrey Wakefield prepares to hand over the estate to his apprehensive son Maximilian. Hard-working staff at Carlton Towers in North Yorkshire get ready for the arrival of 120 caravan owners for the annual rally and dinner dance

programme.title: Fish Town
programme.desc: Life in the Devon fishing port of Brixham. Spring is in the air, and the town is a hive of activity as skippers return their pleasure yachts to the water after winter in the dry dock, while the pressure is on for Brixham to look its best for the arrival of Princess Anne, who will officially open the new £20million fish market, and the start of the summer season

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: King in the North Robb Stark is incensed when he learns he has been betrayed by one of his closest friends, while his fugitive sister Arya calls in a debt, leaving mysterious convict Jaqen Hghar with a difficult decision to make. Meanwhile, across the Narrow Sea, Daenerys is presented with a dilemma as she struggles to negotiate with the seemingly egalitarian lords of Qarth

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: King Joffreys days on the Iron Throne appear to be numbered as Stannis lays claim to his late brother Roberts realm with a naval assault on Kings Landing. The realities of all-out war leave the young tyrant reeling, and it is left to his sharp-witted uncle Tyrion to launch a defensive strategy that could save his family and decide the fate of the seven battle-scarred kingdoms of Westeros. Jack Gleeson, Peter Dinklage and Stephen Dillane star in an episode written by George RR Martin, whose novels form the basis for the series

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: Theon Greyjoy stirs his men into action as Maester Luwin offers some final advice, Arya receives a gift from the mysterious Jaqen, and Daenerys summons the courage to enter the House of the Undying. Meanwhile, Jon proves his worth as a brother of the Nights Watch to Qhorin Halfhand. Fantasy drama, based on George RR Martins Song of Ice and Fire novels, and starring Maisie Williams, Kit Harington and Alfie Allen

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: In Kings Landing, Sansa grows in confidence under the watchful eye of the Machiavellian Lord Baelish, while Tyrion is after his just reward for the part he played in the Battle of the Blackwater. In the far North, Jon Snow is brought before formidable wildling leader Mance Rayder (Ciaran Hinds) and attempts to earn the trust of the King-beyond-the-Wall. Across the Narrow Sea, Daenerys Targaryen arrives in Slavers Bay with adviser Ser Jorah Mormont looking to form an army. Fantasy drama based on George RR Martins A Song of Ice and Fire series of novels, starring Peter Dinklage, Emilia Clarke and Kit Harington

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: In Kings Landing, Shae sneaks into Tyrions chamber to tell him Ros warned her about Baelishs interest in Sansa, who goes to tea with Margaery and her grandmother Lady Olenna and is encouraged to speak freely about Joffrey. Jaime passes the time by taunting his escort Brienne, Arya encounters outlaw group the Brotherhood Without Banners, while Lord Karstark makes Robb aware he no longer has faith in him. Fantasy drama, guest starring Diana Rigg

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: Tyrion assumes new responsibilities, Jon is taken to the imposing Fist of the First Men, and Jaime strikes a deal with his captors. Meanwhile, Daenerys meets with the slavers as she moves to build an army. Fantasy drama, starring Peter Dinklage, Nikolaj Coster-Waldau and Emilia Clarke

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.sub-title: And Now His Watch Is Ended

Across the Narrow Sea, Daenerys takes charge of her army of the Unsullied, while in Kings Landing, Cersei tells her father that Margaery is manipulating Joffrey, and Varys meets his match when he talks to Lady Olenna. Fantasy drama based on George RR Martins A Song of Ice and Fire series of novels, starring Maisie Williams, Conleth Hill and Emilia Clarke

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: The Hound is judged by the gods, while Jaime receives a different form of justice at the hands of men. Robb is betrayed, Jon proves himself and Tyrion learns the true cost of a wedding. Fantasy drama, starring Richard Madden, Kit Harington and Peter Dinklage

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: Lord Tywin plans strategic unions for the Lannisters, Melisandre visits the Riverlands and Robb weighs up a compromise to repair his alliance with House Frey. Roose Bolton decides what to do with Jaime, while Jon, Ygritte and the wildlings face a daunting climb. Fantasy drama, starring Charles Dance

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.sub-title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
programme.desc: In Kings Landing, Sansa frets about her prospects, Tyrions new situation agitates Shae, and Tywin counsels the king. Daenerys exchanges gifts with a slave lord outside Yunkai, Melisandre reveals a secret to Robert Baratheons illegitimate son Gendry, and Brienne faces a formidable foe at Harrenhal. Emilia Clarke and Peter Dinklage star in an episode written by George RR Martin, whose novels form the basis for the series

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: Daenerys and her entourage discover Yunkais powerful friends are the Second Sons, an elite army of mercenaries. Determined to take the city and increase the strength of her own forces, the queen agrees to meet the sellsword companys captains - intending to make them a better offer. Meanwhile, Davos is still desperate to make Stannis see clearly and demands to see proof of Melisandres power. There is a wedding in Kings Landing, and beyond the Wall, Sam and Gilly have a chilling encounter with a foe that seems to have come straight from their nightmares. Fantasy drama, starring Emilia Clarke and Liam Cunningham

programme.title: The Death of Bunny Munro
programme.desc: Following his wife Libbys death by suicide, sex-addicted door-to-door beauty salesman and self-professed Lothario Bunny Munro finds himself saddled with his nine-year-old son and only a loose concept of parenting. As the two struggle to contain their grief in wildly different ways, Bunny takes his lad on the road for an increasingly out-of-control tour across southern England. Adaptation of Nick Caves novel, starring Matt Smith and Rafael Mathe

programme.title: It: Welcome to Derry
programme.sub-title: The Great Swirling Apparatus of Our Planets Function
programme.desc: After their efforts are rejected by Chief Bowers, the kids must deal with their disappointment and a series of increasingly terrifying experiences. Urged on by the Patty Cakes, Marge pulls a mean-spirited prank on Lilly

programme.title: Big Little Lies
programme.desc: Tensions rise at the school when signs of bullying continue, and Madelines relationship with the play director is put under the spotlight

programme.desc: AJ causes problems for his family as he tries to better his life, and a visit to see Junior at the mental institute lands him in trouble with the police. Vito gains an admirer while hiding out in New Hampshire, and Tony is presented with a tempting real-estate offer

Gritty crime drama, starring James Gandolfini

programme.desc: Johnny Sacks trial begins and he refuses to bargain with anyone, while Bobby sustains a serious eye injury during a shooting. Just as things appear to be going well for Vito, he reaches the end of his tether with Jim and pines for his old lifestyle. Tony becomes jealous of Carmela and does his best to ruin her house plans. Gritty crime drama, starring James Gandolfini

programme.title: The Sopranos
programme.desc: Carmelas trip to Paris with Rosalie presents her with a new outlook on life and Meadow decides to move west with Finn. Phil presses Tony to have Vito killed, AJ is placed in a predicament and Fat Dom makes the fatal mistake of telling one joke too many. Edie Falco and Jamie-Lynn Sigler star

programme.title: The Sopranos
programme.desc: Phil Leotardo stokes the fiery feud between the New York and Jersey families. Christopher struggles to overcome his addictions, Tony tries to keep Carmela occupied and AJ finds a new girlfriend

programme.title: The Guest Wing
programme.desc: Everyday life at Northumberlands Chillingham Castle, where the members of staff try to tactfully deal with the whims of their employer, baronet Humphry Wakefield, as the estate prepares to welcome a band of ghost-hunting tourists. Meanwhile, Carlton Towers in East Yorkshire hosts an annual dog show for Afghan hounds

programme.title: Fish Town
programme.desc: Brixham hosts its annual Pirate Festival, paying tribute to Devons colourful maritime history, while fisherman Nathan sets off in search of a lucrative catch

programme.title: Fish Town
programme.desc: Teenager Logan starts work as an apprentice deck-hand, while landlady Pat recalls fond memories from her life in Brixham

programme.title: Fish Town
programme.desc: Fish merchant Robert and his wife Kelly decide to open a seafood restaurant in Brixham - but their determinedly contemporary approach to cuisine leaves some locals unimpressed. The programme also follows the journey of a turbot over 36 hours, as it is caught and auctioned off before being served in an exclusive London restaurant

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: Robb and his bannermen gather at the Twins in the northern Riverlands to attend the wedding of Lord Edmure Tully and Roslin Frey, daughter of Lord Walder. Elsewhere, Jon faces his harshest test to date, Daario and Ser Jorah debate how to take Yunkai, and Bran discovers a new gift. Fantasy drama based on George RR Martins A Song of Ice and Fire novels, starring Richard Madden, Michelle Fairley and David Bradley

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: The various warring factions of Westeros receive news of the events of the wedding at the Twins. In Kings Landing, Joffrey stands up to his grandfather Tywin, Daenerys discovers whether shell be remembered as a conqueror or a liberator in Yunkai, and mercy comes from a surprising source in Dragonstone. Fantasy drama, starring Emilia Clarke, Charles Dance and Jack Gleeson

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: Tyrion is sent out to welcome a royal party from Dorne outside the walls of Kings Landing, and Jon Snow finds himself on trial at Castle Black over his time with the wildlings and the death of Qhorin Halfhand. Daenerys heads toward the slave city of Meereen, and Arya runs into a familiar face. Fantasy drama, starring Peter Dinklage, Emilia Clarke and Kit Harington

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: In Kings Landing, the day of King Joffreys wedding to Margaery Tyrell arrives, and while the sadistic monarch delights in tormenting his uncle Tyrion, the capitals various factions plot further alliances. However, all attention is drawn back to Joffrey following the arrival of a pie filled with live birds. Meanwhile, Melisandre oversees a sacrifice to the Lord of Light at Dragonstone as three traitors are burned at the stake, and the future continues to look grim for Theon as Ramsay Snow finds a use for him. North of the Wall, Bran sees clearly where he and his friends must go after experiencing a series of visions

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: Ser Dontos spirits Sansa out of Kings Landing and rows her out to a waiting ship, and Pod gives Tyrion news of his forthcoming trial. Tywin counsels Tommen on what makes a good king and also has an offer for Oberyn Martell. Sam decides Castle Black is not a safe places for Gilly, while Jon proposes a bold plan after the wildlings send a chilling message. Across the Narrow Sea, Daenerys picks a champion to take on the best that Meereen has to offer and Davos has an idea about raising funds for Stanniss cause

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: In Kings Landing, Jaime finally visits Tyrion in jail after some persuasion from Bronn, and he also has a mission for Brienne. Daenerys tries to balance justice and mercy in Meereen. At Castle Black, Jon asks for volunteers when Ser Alliser decides to let him go to Crasters Keep to deal with the mutineers. Fantasy drama, starring Emilia Clarke, Nikolaj Coster-Waldau and Kit Harrington

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: In Kings Landing, Cersei and Tywin plot the next move for the Lannisters and the Crown after Tommens coronation, while Ser Jorah gives Daenerys worrying news about the situations in Yunkai and Astapor. Jon and his band of volunteers mount a raid on the mutineers at Crasters Keep, and Sansa and Littlefinger arrive at the Eyrie. Fantasy drama, starring Lena Headey, Charles Dance, Emilia Clarke and Kit Harington

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.sub-title: The Laws of Gods and Men
programme.desc: Stannis and Davos arrive in Braavos for their meeting with the Iron Bank, but find Tycho Nestoris (Mark Gatiss) a hard man to do business with. Yara Greyjoy leads a band of Ironborn on a mission to rescue her brother Theon, while Daenerys meets with supplicants in Meereen. In Kings Landing, Tyrions trial begins in the throne room and he is stunned by the identity of one of the crowns witnesses. Fantasy drama, starring Stephen Dillane and Peter Dinklage

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: Tyrion enlists an unlikely ally, while Daario entreats Daenerys to allow him to do what he does best. Jons warnings about the Walls vulnerability fall on deaf ears, while Brienne and Pod follow a new lead as they continues their mission to track down the Stark girls. Fantasy drama, starring Peter Dinklage, Kit Harington and Emilia Clarke

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: Tyrions fate is decided as his champion Oberyn Martell faces against Gregor the Mountain Clegane in his trial by combat, while Moles Town is on the receiving end of a raid by the wildlings. Ramsay sends Theon into Moat Cailin to negotiate the surrender of the Ironborn troops holding the fort, Littlefinger and Sansa are questioned about the circumstances surrounding Lysas death and Barristan confronts Jorah about a document delivered to him. Fantasy drama, starring Peter Dinklage and Pedro Pascal

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: The men of the Nights Watch face their biggest challenge yet as they prepare to defend the Wall and Castle Black against attacks from the north and south by Mance Rayders wildling army, with Ygritte determined to be the one to kill Jon Snow. Sam gets some sage advice about love from Maester Aemon and is shocked when someone comes knocking at the gates seeking shelter. Fantasy drama, starring Kit Harington and directed by Neil Marshall, the man behind the second series episode depicting the Battle of the Blackwater

programme.title: All Her Fault
programme.desc: Alcaras turns his attention to the recent Chicago marathon, while Peter takes matters into his own hands. Mystery thriller based on the book by Andrea Mara, starring Sarah Snook

programme.title: True Detective
programme.desc: When Julias mental-health struggles resurface, Navarro takes her to a local facility, promising that this time will be better. Later, Danvers and Navarro confirm the location of Annies murder, while the police chief levies a harsh punishment on Leah following her stepdaughters act of protest

programme.title: The Wire
programme.desc: Sobotka reprimands Ziggy and Nick for stealing the cameras and orders them to bring the cargo back. To placate Valchek, Burrell asks Daniels to lead the detail investigating the union leader, and the lieutenant agrees on the promise of his own major crimes unit after the case ends. McNulty begins courting his estranged wife, promising a fresh start and a new Jimmy. Drama, starring Dominic West, Lance Reddick and Chris Bauer

programme.title: In Treatment
programme.desc: Paul holds his first session with April, an architecture student - and becomes concerned when the young woman seems reluctant to reveal why she is seeking therapy. With Gabriel Byrne and Alison Pill

programme.title: Succession
programme.desc: The Waystar team heads to Norway to meet Matsson and his staff, while Shiv, Kendall and Roman consider whether to fight for Logans original deal

programme.title: It: Welcome to Derry
programme.desc: After learning the truth about General Shaws operation, Leroy decides to move his family to the base for safety. While the tribal Keepers strategise how to contain increased aggression in town, the military descends on Neibolt Street, and the kids head into the sewers with their own objective.

programme.title: Banshee
programme.desc: Carrie and Lucas enlist the help of Fat Au in a desperate attempt to track down and rescue Job. Drama, starring Antony Starr

programme.title: The Guest Wing
programme.desc: Documentary following stately home owners who hire out their estates to earn extra income, and the clients who pay to use their properties for functions including stag parties, weddings and hunting trips. The programme explores how the reality of life in Britains grand houses is often less glamorous than it appears, as proprietors struggle to maintain crumbling buildings and pay utility bills, and examines the modern-day divide between domestic staff and their employers. Featuring life at Chillingham Castle, Maunsel House, Carlton Towers and Muncaster Castle

programme.title: Man of Steel
programme.desc: With the imminent destruction of their home planet approaching, a man and his wife seek to preserve their race by sending their infant son to Earth. The childs spacecraft lands at the farm of Jonathan and Martha Kent, who name him Clark and raise him as their own son. Though his extraordinary abilities have led to the adult Clark living on the fringe of society, he is forced to take a stand to protect his adopted home from a fanatical general from his own world, who intends to wipe out the human race. Sci-fi adventure based on the Superman comic-books, starring Henry Cavill, Amy Adams, Michael Shannon and Russell Crowe

programme.title: Superman
programme.desc: A fledgling superhero crash-lands on Earth after evacuation from his home planet and is taken in by an elderly couple who raise him as their own. But with adolescence comes a greater understanding of his superhuman powers, leading to his rebirth as a crusader for justice and defender of the American way of life. Comic-strip adventure, with Christopher Reeve, Gene Hackman, Margot Kidder and Marlon Brando

programme.title: Superman II
programme.desc: The Man of Steel meets his match in the form of three fugitive villains from his home planet of Krypton. Flying down to Earth, the super-powered trio unleash a reign of terror in a bid to take over the world - but Superman is not there to stop them, having surrendered his powers to lead a normal life with his beloved Lois Lane. Comic-strip adventure sequel, with Christopher Reeve, Gene Hackman, Terence Stamp and Margot Kidder

programme.title: Superman III
programme.desc: The Man of Steel battles an evil tycoon, who has recruited a computer genius to aid his schemes for world domination. Together the villains hatch a plan to dispose of Superman once and for all - but instead of killing the superhero, they accidentally unveil his dark side. Comic-book adventure sequel, starring Christopher Reeve, Richard Pryor, Robert Vaughn and Margot Kidder

programme.title: Superman IV: The Quest for Peace
programme.desc: The Man of Steel embarks on a mission to destroy every nuclear weapon on the planet. However, his arch-enemy Lex Luthor sees the chance to rid himself of the superhero by creating a deadly radioactive henchman who causes havoc around the world. Comic-book adventure sequel, starring Christopher Reeve, Gene Hackman, Mark Pillow and Margot Kidder

programme.title: Superman Returns
programme.desc: The Man of Steel returns to Earth after an absence of several years to find his lost love Lois Lane has moved on with her life. Meanwhile, arch-villain Lex Luthor is out of jail and about to wreak havoc on the world with technology stolen from Supermans home planet of Krypton. Comic-book adventure from X-Men director Bryan Singer, with Brandon Routh, Kevin Spacey, Kate Bosworth and Parker Posey

programme.title: The Cinema List: Antiheroes
programme.desc: From Dirty Harry and The Godfather to the deeply imperfect gang from the Fast and the Furious franchise, this Cinema List celebrates our favourite anti-heroes

programme.title: Superman II
programme.desc: The Man of Steel meets his match in the form of three fugitive villains from his home planet of Krypton. Comic-strip adventure sequel, with Christopher Reeve, Gene Hackman, Terence Stamp and Margot Kidder

programme.title: Over the Hedge
programme.desc: A raccoon trickster is fretting about his debt to a fearsome bear when he stumbles on some animals waking in the woods after their winter nap. Spotting the chance to solve his problem, the raccoon dupes the gullible creatures into stealing food from a nearby suburb so he can give it to the bear - but they fail to realise they will soon be at the mercy of a vermin exterminator. Animated comedy, with the voices of Bruce Willis, Steve Carell, Garry Shandling and William Shatner

programme.title: Open Season
programme.desc: A mischievous deer tempts Boog, a domesticated grizzly bear with no survival skills, to try life on the wild side. However, with the hunting season in full swing, all the fearful woodland creatures urge Boog to unleash his inner ferocity and drive the gunmen out of the forest. Animated comedy, featuring the voices of Martin Lawrence, Ashton Kutcher, Gary Sinise and Billy Connolly

programme.title: Shrek
programme.desc: Anti-social ogre Shrek resolves to stop an evil ruler from banishing fairy-tale characters to his swampland home. However, the reluctant hero ends up forced to rescue the beautiful Princess Fiona from a castle guarded by a dragon, aided only by a wisecracking donkey. Animated comedy, with the voices of Mike Myers, John Lithgow, Cameron Diaz, Eddie Murphy and Vincent Cassel

programme.title: The Emoji Movie
programme.desc: In a world of living ideograms, multi-expressional emoji Gene embarks on a daring mission to find notorious hacker Jailbreak. Animated adventure, featuring the voices of TJ Miller, James Corden and Patrick Stewart

programme.title: Shrek 2
programme.desc: The grouchy ogre and his new wife Princess Fiona set out on a journey to meet her parents. However, the king and queen are less than impressed with their daughters choice of husband, while a conniving fairy godmother is determined to make sure her own son gets to marry the princess. Animated adventure sequel, with the voices of Mike Myers, Cameron Diaz, Eddie Murphy, Antonio Banderas, John Cleese, Julie Andrews, Jennifer Saunders and Rupert Everett

programme.title: Over the Hedge
programme.desc: A raccoon trickster is fretting about his debt to a fearsome bear when he stumbles on some animals waking in the woods after their winter nap. Spotting the chance to solve his problem, the raccoon dupes the gullible creatures into stealing food from a nearby suburb so he can give it to the bear - but they fail to realise they will soon be at the mercy of a vermin exterminator. Animated comedy, with the voices of Bruce Willis, Steve Carell, Garry Shandling and William Shatner

programme.title: The Boss Baby
programme.desc: A youngster believes his baby brother is actually a power-hungry tycoon sent to destroy his perfect family life. However, the duo must put aside their differences and work together when they uncover a plot to sabotage the company their parents work for. Animated comedy, featuring the voices of Alec Baldwin, Steve Buscemi, Jimmy Kimmel and Lisa Kudrow

programme.title: The Adventures of Tintin: The Secret of the Unicorn
programme.desc: A reporters purchase of a model ship brings him under threat from a ruthless criminal, as it is one of a series of clues to the location of the real vessel, which holds a pirates lost treasure. He sets off on a globetrotting quest to find it, assisted by a drunken sea captain, two bumbling detectives and his faithful dog. Steven Spielbergs animated adventure based on Herges comic-strip series, with the voices of Jamie Bell, Andy Serkis and Daniel Craig

programme.title: Open Season 2
programme.desc: Wild dog Mr Weenie is kidnapped by a gang of family pets, who intend to brainwash him into returning to domesticated life, and his friends must make a perilous journey into human territory to save him. Animated comedy sequel, with the voices of Joel McHale, Jane Krakowski, Mike Epps, Billy Connolly and Crispin Glover

programme.title: Arthur Christmas
programme.desc: Santa Claus gift-giving routine has developed into a complex hi-tech operation. However, when one girl is accidentally missed out, his youngest son Arthur takes control of the family sleigh to deliver her gifts the old-fashioned way - but following in his fathers footsteps is not as easy as it looks. Animated comedy, with the voices of James McAvoy, Jim Broadbent and Bill Nighy

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda 3
programme.desc: The clumsy hero is reunited with his long-lost father, whose help he will need when a supernatural foe threatens all of China. Father and son travel to a secret village populated by other pandas, and must train them in martial arts so they can defend their home. Animated comedy sequel, with the voices of Jack Black, Bryan Cranston, Angelina Jolie and Dustin Hoffman

programme.title: Open Season: Scared Silly
programme.desc: Boog, Elliot and their pals team up to track down an elusive werewolf and prevent their forest from being intruded upon by hunter Shaw. Animation, with the voice of Will Townsend and Donny Lucas

programme.title: The Road to El Dorado
programme.desc: Two Spanish conmen set off for South America on a quest to discover the legendary City of Gold, but soon find themselves in the enviable position of being worshipped as gods by the natives - much to the displeasure of a local priest. Animated musical adventure, with the voices of Kevin Kline, Kenneth Branagh, Rosie Perez, Armand Assante and Edward James Olmos, and featuring a soundtrack by Elton John

programme.title: Open Season 2
programme.desc: Wild dog Mr Weenie is kidnapped by a gang of family pets, who intend to brainwash him into returning to domesticated life, and his friends must make a perilous journey into human territory to save him. Animated comedy sequel, with the voices of Joel McHale, Jane Krakowski, Mike Epps, Billy Connolly and Crispin Glover

However, the duo must put aside their differences and work together when they uncover a plot to sabotage the company their parents work for. Animated comedy, featuring the voices of Alec Baldwin, Steve Buscemi, Jimmy Kimmel and Lisa Kudrow

programme.title: Shrek the Third
programme.desc: The bad-tempered ogre finds himself in the unwelcome position of being next in line for the throne. Preferring to stay at home in the swamps, he sets out on a quest to find the rightful heir - a rebellious teenager named Artie - and persuade him to face up to his responsibilities as the future king. Meanwhile, the ambitious Prince Charming sees his chance to take the throne. Animated comedy, with the voices of Mike Myers, Cameron Diaz, Justin Timberlake, Eddie Murphy, Antonio Banderas and Rupert Everett

programme.title: The Adventures of Tintin: The Secret of the Unicorn
programme.desc: A reporters purchase of a model ship brings him under threat from a ruthless criminal, as it is one of a series of clues to the location of the real vessel, which holds a pirates lost treasure. He sets off on a globetrotting quest to find it, assisted by a drunken sea captain, two bumbling detectives and his faithful dog. Steven Spielbergs animated adventure based on Herges comic-strip series, with the voices of Jamie Bell, Andy Serkis and Daniel Craig

programme.title: How to Train Your Dragon
programme.desc: A clumsy Viking boy longs to become a mighty dragon slayer and protect his village from the fearsome flying lizards, but his father thinks he is not up to the task. However, when he sets out to prove his worth, he ends up befriending a dragon, and realises his people may have misjudged the creatures. Animated fantasy, with the voices of Jay Baruchel and Gerard Butler

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda
programme.desc: A hero is needed to defend a peaceful valley community from attack by a rampaging snow leopard. The unlikely candidate for the job is a lazy panda, who enlists the aid of a legendary team of animal fighters and their wise master to teach him the martial arts skills he needs to fulfil his destiny. Animated comedy, with the voices of Jack Black, Dustin Hoffman, Angelina Jolie, Ian McShane and Jackie Chan

programme.title: Open Season 3
programme.desc: Boog the bear visits a Russian travelling circus, where he meets another bear named Doug who is his exact double. Doug suggests they swap places for the day, but when the time comes to go back to their old lives, Doug is nowhere to be found, leaving Boog trapped. Animated adventure, with the voices of Matthew J Munn and Matthew W Taylor

programme.title: The Adventures of Tintin: The Secret of the Unicorn
programme.desc: A reporters purchase of a model ship brings him under threat from a ruthless criminal, as it is one of a series of clues to the location of the real vessel, which holds a pirates lost treasure. He sets off on a globetrotting quest to find it, assisted by a drunken sea captain, two bumbling detectives and his faithful dog. Steven Spielbergs animated adventure based on Herges comic-strip series, with the voices of Jamie Bell, Andy Serkis and Daniel Craig

programme.title: The Road to El Dorado
programme.desc: Two Spanish conmen set off for South America on a quest to discover the legendary City of Gold, but soon find themselves in the enviable position of being worshipped as gods by the natives - much to the displeasure of a local priest. Animated musical adventure, with the voices of Kevin Kline, Kenneth Branagh, Rosie Perez, Armand Assante and Edward James Olmos, and featuring a soundtrack by Elton John

programme.title: Fox and Hare Save the Forest
programme.desc: A fox and a hare embark on a journey to find their missing owl friend. Animated adventure, with the voices of Teresa Gallagher, Dan Skinner and Sarah Madigan

programme.title: Boonie Bears: Guardian Code
programme.desc: Two bears, Briar and Bramble, lose their mother at a young age. Many years later, when an older female bear shows up on the scene, the siblings are determined to find out the truth. Animated adventure, with the voices of Joseph S Lambert and Paul Maxx Rinehart

programme.title: Scarygirl
programme.desc: When her world is shrouded in darkness, a young girl must travel to the mysterious city of light to save her father from a lethal scientist and prevent her planets destruction. Animated fantasy adventure, featuring the voices of Anna Torv, Sam Neill and Tim Minchin

programme.title: Tom and Jerry: A Nutcracker Tale
programme.desc: When Jerry visits an empty opera house, he makes a wish for the chance to perform. His dream comes true, and he is transported to a magical kingdom where he dances with a musical box ballerina. However, a group of alley cats, led by the mischievous Tom, wreaks havoc on the enchanted world and steals the ballerina. Jerry, accompanied by a fellow rodent named Tuffy and his friends, sets out on a mission to put things right. Animated adventure, featuring the voices of Richard Newman, Garry Chalk and Mark Oliver

programme.title: A Boy Called Christmas
programme.desc: An ordinary boy, with a loyal pet mouse and a reindeer at his side, sets out on an extraordinary adventure to find his father, who is on a quest to discover the fabled village of Elfhelm. Festive family adventure, starring Henry Lawfull, Toby Jones, Sally Hawkins and Kristen Wiig

programme.title: Arthur Christmas
programme.desc: Santa Claus gift-giving routine has developed into a complex hi-tech operation. However, when one girl is accidentally missed out, his youngest son Arthur takes control of the family sleigh to deliver her gifts the old-fashioned way - but following in his fathers footsteps is not as easy as it looks. Animated comedy, with the voices of James McAvoy, Jim Broadbent and Bill Nighy

programme.title: The Grinch
programme.desc: In the magical town of Whoville, a race of human-like creatures called Whos are thrilled about celebrating Christmas. However, a cantankerous, furry green loner named the Grinch, who lives in a cave north of Whoville, hatches a dastardly scheme to ruin the festive season. Animated Dr Seuss adaptation, with the voices of Benedict Cumberbatch, Pharrell Williams and Rashida Jones

programme.title: Elf
programme.desc: A child is taken in by kind-hearted Santa and raised as an elf - so it comes as a shock when he discovers years later that he is in fact human. Deciding to get back to his roots, he heads off for New York in search of his long-lost family, but is ill-prepared for the hustle and bustle of the Big Apple. Fantasy comedy, starring Will Ferrell, James Caan, Zooey Deschanel and Edward Asner

programme.title: A Boy Called Christmas
programme.desc: An ordinary boy, with a loyal pet mouse and a reindeer at his side, sets out on an extraordinary adventure to find his father, who is on a quest to discover the fabled village of Elfhelm. Festive family adventure, starring Henry Lawfull, Toby Jones, Sally Hawkins and Kristen Wiig

Fantasy comedy, starring Will Ferrell, James Caan, Zooey Deschanel and Edward Asner

programme.title: Tidings for the Season
programme.desc: A TV newscasters life changes when he meets his young superfan and the boys hardworking single mom. Romantic drama, starring BJ Britt

programme.title: Planes, Trains and Automobiles
programme.desc: A stressed businessman just wants to make it home to spend Thanksgiving with his family. However, when his flight is forced to land miles from its destination, he finds himself sharing a disaster-strewn journey across America with an amiable but slobbish salesman. Comedy road movie, starring Steve Martin, John Candy, Laila Robins, Kevin Bacon and Michael McKean

programme.title: Silent Night
programme.desc: On Christmas Eve, a grieving father enacts his long-awaited revenge against a ruthless gang. Director John Woos action thriller, starring Joel Kinnaman and Catalina Sandino Moreno

programme.title: Maps and Mistletoe
programme.desc: A cartographer has plans for Christmas at home, until her boss gives her a project - designing a treasure map of the North Pole. Festive romance, with Humberly González

programme.title: The Cinema List: Elfmas
programme.desc: Learn how to celebrate Christmas the elf way as we unpick Buddys festive routine in the holiday classic, Elf

programme.title: Prancer: A Christmas Tale
programme.desc: Ten-year-old Gloria and her recently widowed grandfather Bud befriend a mysterious reindeer when the family gathers for Christmas. Bud comes to believe that Prancer may actually be magical, but Gloria fears his theory will send him straight to a retirement home. Festive family drama, starring James Cromwell and Darcey Ewart

programme.title: The Polar Express
programme.desc: A boy begins to doubt whether Father Christmas really exists as he waits for the sound of sleigh bells on Christmas Eve. But he and hundreds of other lucky children receive a shock when a magical steam engine arrives in the night to take them to the North Pole and meet the man himself. Robert Zemeckis animated adventure, based on Chris Van Allsburgs book, features the voices of Tom Hanks, Leslie Zemeckis and Eddie Deezen

But he and hundreds of other lucky children receive a shock when a magical steam engine arrives in the night to take them to the North Pole and meet the man himself. Robert Zemeckis animated adventure, based on Chris Van Allsburgs book, features the voices of Tom Hanks, Leslie Zemeckis and Eddie Deezen

programme.title: The Grinch
programme.desc: In the magical town of Whoville, a race of human-like creatures called Whos are thrilled about celebrating Christmas. However, a cantankerous, furry green loner named the Grinch, who lives in a cave north of Whoville, hatches a dastardly scheme to ruin the festive season. Animated Dr Seuss adaptation, with the voices of Benedict Cumberbatch, Pharrell Williams and Rashida Jones

programme.title: The Holiday
programme.desc: Two single women living on opposite sides of the Atlantic agree to exchange houses over the Christmas holidays. In their new surroundings, both women unexpectedly encounter prospective partners, but as the house swap draws to a close, difficult decisions have to be made about their blossoming relationships. Romantic comedy, starring Cameron Diaz, Kate Winslet, Jack Black, Jude Law and Eli Wallach

programme.title: Daddys Home 2
programme.desc: Having settled their differences, Brad and Dustys newfound friendship is put to the test when their respective fathers - one gentle, the other overly macho - arrive for the Christmas holidays, forcing them to change their plans. What starts as a break at a fun-filled trip to a luxury resort turns into something far more chaotic. Comedy, starring Will Ferrell, Mark Wahlberg, Mel Gibson and John Lithgow

programme.title: Happy Christmas
programme.desc: A woman moves in with her brother and his family after her latest break-up. She begins a relationship with a drug dealer who babysits the couples two-year-old son, while also trying to persuade her sister-in-law that she needs to try and get more out of her life. Comedy drama, starring Anna Kendrick, Melanie Lynskey and Lena Dunham

programme.title: Fred Claus
programme.desc: Santas selfish brother Fred has been ostracised by his family for years, but when his crooked ways land him in jail, his brother comes along to bail him out on one condition - he must return to the family business and make toys for Christmas. But instead of cleaning up his act, Fred pushes Santas patience to the limit with his far from festive attitude. Comedy, starring Vince Vaughn, Paul Giamatti, Rachel Weisz, Miranda Richardson and Kevin Spacey

programme.title: The Christmas Movie Countdown
programme.desc: The nations favourite festive film is revealed as Simon Callow presents a countdown of the top 25 as voted for by the public

programme.title: The Cinema List
programme.desc: Fancy a career change? This week, the Cinema List goes hunting for jobs with these film names as a guide. From The Mechanic to The Accountant, dust off your CV with these hardworking hits.

programme.title: Tommy
programme.desc: A teenager is struck deaf, mute and blind by a childhood trauma. He finds self-expression through pinball, proving his worth by beating a master of the game. However, the pressures of fame take their toll on the youngster, who becomes the focus of a religious cult. Ken Russells rock opera based on the Whos album, starring Roger Daltrey, Oliver Reed, Ann-Margret, Robert Powell, Jack Nicholson, Tina Turner and Keith Moon

programme.title: The Bridges at Toko-Ri
programme.desc: An American naval reserve pilot is called up for service in the Korean War, and must leave his family and civilian job as a lawyer. In command of a corps of naval pilots, he heads a bombing campaign on strategic Communist positions, but later comes to question the morality of the conflict. Adventure, starring William Holden, Grace Kelly, Fredric March and Mickey Rooney

programme.title: Grease
programme.desc: Rebellious American teenager Danny falls for innocent Australian girl Sandy during the summer holidays, but when he later finds out she is a new student at his school, he risks losing her love by trying to act cool in front of his friends. Romantic musical set in the 1950s, starring John Travolta, Olivia Newton-John, Stockard Channing, Jeff Conaway, Didi Conn and Sid Caesar

programme.title: The China Syndrome
programme.desc: A nuclear power plant controller discovers a potentially disastrous operational flaw but refuses to report it. A visiting TV journalist and cameraman pick up on the story - but as they struggle to get the news on air, a quick-witted engineer realises the danger is far more pronounced than anyone suspects. Thriller, starring Jane Fonda, Michael Douglas, Jack Lemmon and Scott Brady

programme.title: To Catch a Thief
programme.desc: A retired cat burglar becomes the prime suspect for a series of robberies carried out in his own distinctive style, and sets out to clear his name by catching the copycat crook responsible. His quest takes him to the Cote dAzur, where he encounters the demure daughter of a wealthy holiday-maker, and before long the two are drawn together. Alfred Hitchcocks romantic mystery, starring Cary Grant, Grace Kelly and Jessie Royce Landis

programme.title: Galaxy Quest
programme.desc: The cast of a cancelled sci-fi series are reduced to a life of conventions and public appearances, only to find themselves genuinely transported into space. Naive aliens have mistaken the show for real life and want the actors to help defend them from an evil extraterrestrial warlord. Sci-fi comedy, starring Tim Allen, Sigourney Weaver, Alan Rickman and Sam Rockwell

programme.title: Grease
programme.desc: Rebellious American teenager Danny falls for innocent Australian girl Sandy during the summer holidays, but when he later finds out she is a new student at his school, he risks losing her love by trying to act cool in front of his friends. Romantic musical set in the 1950s, starring John Travolta, Olivia Newton-John, Stockard Channing, Jeff Conaway, Didi Conn and Sid Caesar

programme.title: Dirty Harry
programme.desc: Maverick San Francisco detective Dirty Harry Callahan sets out to capture a deranged sniper picking off victims at random. Although his own tactics barely stay within the confines of the law, he is determined the killer will face his particular brand of justice, regardless of his superiors disapproval. Don Siegels thriller, starring Clint Eastwood, Harry Guardino and Andy Robinson

programme.title: The Exorcist
programme.desc: A girl is possessed by a formidable demonic entity that resists all efforts at freeing her from its grasp. In desperation, the childs mother appeals for help from a local priest and a veteran exorcist, but succeeding in this nightmarish contest of wills threatens the lives of both men. William Friedkins horror, starring Linda Blair, Jason Miller, Ellen Burstyn, Max von Sydow and Lee J Cobb

programme.title: Bram Stokers Dracula
programme.desc: A 15th-century Transylvanian knight becomes a vampire after the death of his beloved wife. Centuries later, he learns she has been reincarnated, and travels to Victorian London with the intent of seducing her into joining him in living death. Francis Ford Coppolas Gothic horror based on the novel, starring Gary Oldman, Winona Ryder, Anthony Hopkins and Keanu Reeves

programme.title: True Grit
programme.desc: One-eyed, over-the-hill US Marshal Rooster Cogburn reluctantly agrees to help a girl track down her fathers killer. The quest is complicated by a Texas Ranger, who is also on the murderers trail, and a host of villains who have few qualms about disposing of the meddling youngster and her protector. Western, starring an Oscar-winning John Wayne alongside Jeff Corey, Kim Darby, Glen Campbell, Robert Duvall and Dennis Hopper

programme.title: The Flintstones
programme.desc: Blue-collar caveman Fred Flintstone is promoted to an executive position at work and unwittingly becomes embroiled in an embezzlement scheme - thanks in no small part to his seductive new assistant. Live-action version of the cartoon comedy, starring John Goodman, Rick Moranis, Rosie ODonnell, Halle Berry and Elizabeth Taylor

programme.title: Shirley Valentine
programme.desc: A Liverpudlian housewife is trapped in a humdrum existence and a dull marriage. Fed up, she decides to go on an unheard-of holiday by herself to a Greek island, where she starts to enjoy life again - especially when she is romanced and seduced by a smooth-talking fisherman. Comedy, adapted from Willy Russells stage play, starring Pauline Collins, Tom Conti, Bernard Hill, Julia McKenzie and Alison Steadman

programme.title: Dumb and Dumber
programme.desc: Dimwitted Rhode Island limousine driver Lloyd Christmas and his equally vacuous friend Harry Dunne embark on a disaster-fraught cross-country trip to Aspen, where they hope to reunite a briefcase with its female owner. However, the pair are unaware the case contains a $1million ransom they would have been better leaving well alone. Farrelly brothers comedy, starring Jim Carrey, Jeff Daniels, Lauren Holly, Teri Garr and Mike Starr

programme.title: The Big Chill
programme.desc: Seven old friends are reunited when they gather for the funeral of a former fellow college student. Over the course of a weekend together, they reflect on the dead mans demise and how their attitudes to life have changed since they last met, reminiscing on the faded idealism of youth. Drama, starring Glenn Close, Tom Berenger, Kevin Kline, Jeff Goldblum, William Hurt and Meg Tilly

programme.title: Little Women
programme.desc: Four sisters are raised by their strong-willed mother while their father is away fighting in the American Civil War. Although one yearns to become a writer and another dreams of being married, the girls remain firmly united as the family steers a course through hard times and tragic events. Period drama, based on Louisa May Alcotts novel, with Winona Ryder, Susan Sarandon, Claire Danes, Samantha Mathis and Kirsten Dunst

programme.title: Breakfast at Tiffanys
programme.desc: An aspiring writer falls for a seemingly happy-go-lucky woman living in the same apartment building, and is drawn to her unconventional lifestyle. However, he detects her quirky demeanour is masking a colourful past, while her mysterious visits to an imprisoned gangster have unexpected consequences. Romantic comedy drama based on Truman Capotes novel, with Audrey Hepburn, George Peppard, Mickey Rooney and Martin Balsam

programme.title: Scent of a Woman
programme.desc: A blind, hard-drinking war veteran pays a timid college student to accompany him on a weekend break in the big city, where he plans to make the most of life. However, the youngster is shocked to learn that at the end of their trip, his new friend plans to kill himself. Comedy drama, starring an Oscar-winning Al Pacino, Chris ODonnell, Gabrielle Anwar and Philip Seymour Hoffman

programme.title: In the Line of Fire
programme.desc: An ageing secret service agent, tormented by his failure to save the life of John F Kennedy in 1963, is drawn into a battle of wits with a sinister CIA-trained assassin out to kill the current president. As the day of reckoning draws closer, the agents nerves are tested to the limit - and nothing seems to be going his way. Wolfgang Petersens thriller, starring Clint Eastwood, John Malkovich, Rene Russo and Dylan McDermott

programme.title: The Krays
programme.desc: Biopic of the infamous twin brothers who built up a criminal empire in the East End of London during the 1960s. Seizing territory from an already established rival by force, they quickly rose to prominence in the citys gangland culture. However, over time the brothers began to clash, while enemies stood ready to bring them down. Gangster biopic, starring Gary and Martin Kemp, Billie Whitelaw and Tom Bell.

programme.title: Enter the Dragon
programme.desc: A powerful crime kingpin hosts a martial arts tournament on his island lair. A former Shaolin monk is recruited by an intelligence agency to enter the tournament and expose the crime lords opium and slavery rings. He finds himself fighting for his life alongside two Vietnam veterans who are both fleeing their own enemies. Thriller, starring Bruce Lee, John Saxon, Jim Kelly and Kien Shih

programme.title: Pet Sematary
programme.desc: A father tries to resurrect his dead son by placing him in an enchanted burial ground but the plan backfires with devastating results. Horror, starring Dale Midkiff, Fred Gwynne and Denise Crosby, with a cameo appearance by author Stephen King, whose book provided the basis for the film

programme.title: Waynes World 2
programme.desc: Heavy metal fanatics Wayne and Garth try to stage a giant Woodstock-style rock festival, with a little help from a spaced-out British roadie and the ghost of Jim Morrison. But Wayne also has to stop his girlfriend leaving him for her slimy manager. Comedy sequel, starring Mike Myers, Dana Carvey, Ralph Brown, Kim Basinger, Tia Carrere and Christopher Walken

programme.title: Thieves Highway
programme.desc: After discovering a plot to haul stolen cattle in the middle of nowhere, a desperate and isolated lawman becomes the only person standing between lethal rustlers and a clear run to the border. Thriller, starring Lochlyn Munro

programme.title: Tidings for the Season
programme.desc: A TV newscasters life changes when he meets his young superfan and the boys hardworking single mom. Romantic drama, starring BJ Britt

programme.title: A Keller Christmas Vacation
programme.desc: Three reluctant adult siblings join their parents on a Christmas river cruise through Europe, each dealing with personal issues. Drama, starring Brandon Routh (Superman Returns), Jonathan Bennett and Eden Sher

programme.title: Mickey 17
programme.desc: In 2054, criminal Mickey Barnes signs up to be a worker who agrees to be reprinted every time he perishes. He flees Earth with friend and accomplice Timo on an interstellar mission to the remote colony of Niflheim, masterminded by Kenneth Marshall and his wife, Ylfa. The 17th iteration of Mickey is presumed dead after a close encounter with creatures on the planets surface, but is saved from a grim fate, and when he arrives back at base, Mickey meets his reprinted self. Director Bong Joon Hos sci-fi comedy, starring Robert Pattinson, Naomi Ackie, Mark Ruffalo, Toni Collette and Steven Yeun

programme.title: Drop
programme.desc: A widowed mothers first date in years takes a chilling turn when shes bombarded with anonymous threatening phone messages during their dinner, leaving her questioning if her charming suitor is behind the harassment. Director Christopher Landons thriller, starring Meghann Fahy and Brandon Sklenar

programme.title: Companion
programme.desc: A billionaires death causes a bloody turn when an AI android built for human companionship goes haywire. Sci-fi horror, starring Jack Quaid, Sophie Thatcher Lukas Gage and Megan Suri

programme.title: Three Wisest Men
programme.desc: Three siblings deal with personal changes and their mothers decision to sell the family home before Christmas. Between in-laws, wild animals, and a mall Santa, they try to make the holidays perfect. Drama, starring Paul Campbell, Tyler Hynes, Andrew Walker and Margaret Colin

programme.title: Tidings for the Season
programme.desc: A TV newscasters life changes when he meets his young superfan and the boys hardworking single mom. Romantic drama, starring BJ Britt

programme.title: Drop
programme.desc: A widowed mothers first date in years takes a chilling turn when shes bombarded with anonymous threatening phone messages during their dinner, leaving her questioning if her charming suitor is behind the harassment. Director Christopher Landons thriller, starring Meghann Fahy and Brandon Sklenar

programme.desc: A billionaires death causes a bloody turn when an AI android built for human companionship goes haywire. Sci-fi horror, starring Jack Quaid, Sophie Thatcher Lukas Gage and Megan Suri

programme.title: My Dead Friend Zoe
programme.desc: An Afghanistan veteran comes head to head with her Vietnam vet grandfather at the familys lake house. Comedy drama, starring Sonequa Martin-Green (The Walking Dead), Natalie Morales and Ed Harris

programme.title: Tidings for the Season
programme.desc: A TV newscasters life changes when he meets his young superfan and the boys hardworking single mom. Romantic drama, starring BJ Britt

programme.title: Companion
programme.desc: A billionaires death causes a bloody turn when an AI android built for human companionship goes haywire. Sci-fi horror, starring Jack Quaid, Sophie Thatcher Lukas Gage and Megan Suri

programme.title: Opus
programme.desc: A writer travels to the remote compound of pop star Alfred Moretti, where she discovers the twisted plans of his cult. Writer/director Mark Anthony Greens thriller, starring Ayo Edebiri, John Malkovich and Juliette Lewis

programme.title: Drop
programme.desc: A widowed mothers first date in years takes a chilling turn when shes bombarded with anonymous threatening phone messages during their dinner, leaving her questioning if her charming suitor is behind the harassment. Director Christopher Landons thriller, starring Meghann Fahy and Brandon Sklenar

Director Bong Joon Hos sci-fi comedy, starring Robert Pattinson, Naomi Ackie, Mark Ruffalo, Toni Collette and Steven Yeun

programme.desc: A TV newscasters life changes when he meets his young superfan and the boys hardworking single mom. Romantic drama, starring BJ Britt

programme.title: Opus
programme.desc: A writer travels to the remote compound of pop star Alfred Moretti, where she discovers the twisted plans of his cult. Writer/director Mark Anthony Greens thriller, starring Ayo Edebiri, John Malkovich and Juliette Lewis

programme.title: Drop
programme.desc: A widowed mothers first date in years takes a chilling turn when shes bombarded with anonymous threatening phone messages during their dinner, leaving her questioning if her charming suitor is behind the harassment. Director Christopher Landons thriller, starring Meghann Fahy and Brandon Sklenar

programme.title: Mickey 17
programme.desc: In 2054, criminal Mickey Barnes signs up to be a worker who agrees to be reprinted every time he perishes. He flees Earth with friend and accomplice Timo on an interstellar mission to the remote colony of Niflheim, masterminded by Kenneth Marshall and his wife, Ylfa. The 17th iteration of Mickey is presumed dead after a close encounter with creatures on the planets surface, but is saved from a grim fate, and when he arrives back at base, Mickey meets his reprinted self. Director Bong Joon Hos sci-fi comedy, starring Robert Pattinson, Naomi Ackie, Mark Ruffalo, Toni Collette and Steven Yeun

programme.title: Thieves Highway
programme.desc: After discovering a plot to haul stolen cattle in the middle of nowhere, a desperate and isolated lawman becomes the only person standing between lethal rustlers and a clear run to the border. Thriller, starring Lochlyn Munro

programme.title: The Woman in the Yard
programme.desc: Inside a rural farmhouse, painter Ramona Harris recuperates with a leg brace following a head-on car collision that claimed the life of her husband. Out of the blue, a woman in funereal garb materialises in a chair on the front lawn of the fixer-upper, and she has no intention of leaving. Psychological horror, starring Danielle Deadwyler, Peyton Jackson and Estella Kahiha

programme.title: My Dead Friend Zoe
programme.desc: An Afghanistan veteran comes head to head with her Vietnam vet grandfather at the familys lake house. Comedy drama, starring Sonequa Martin-Green (The Walking Dead), Natalie Morales and Ed Harris

programme.title: Restore Point
programme.desc: In central Europe during 2041, a female detective investigates the case of a slain couple where a restoration team is able to bring one of them back to life. Sci-fi thriller, starring Andrea Mohylova, Matej Hádek and Milan Ondrík

programme.title: After Earth
programme.desc: A spaceship crash leaves a renowned war hero and his 13-year-old son stranded on Earth, which was abandoned by the human race centuries ago. Since mankinds departure, the planet has become home to all manner of dangerous life-forms, and the boy must make a desperate journey across hostile terrain to secure a rescue for his injured father. Sci-fi adventure, starring Will and Jaden Smith, with Sophie Okonedo

programme.title: Timestalker
programme.desc: A woman is condemned to squander her life in pursuit of a man who does not return her admiration, and she only comes to her senses after lingering briefly in heavenly limbo. Fantasy comedy, written, directed by and starring Alice Lowe, with Jacob Anderson, Nick Frost and Tanya Reynolds

programme.title: The Lawnmower Man
programme.desc: A scientists ill-advised experiments with virtual reality equipment transform a mentally handicapped gardener into a computer-enhanced megalomaniac with the power to make his dreams of world domination come true. Sci-fi thriller, starring Pierce Brosnan, Jeff Fahey, Jenny Wright, Geoffrey Lewis and Austin OBrien

programme.title: Get Out
programme.desc: After African American photographer Chris and his white girlfriend Rose visit her wealthy parents, he suspects theres more to the locals than meets the eye. Oscar-winning psychological thriller written and directed by Jordan Peele (Us), starring Daniel Kaluuya, Allison Williams, Bradley Whitford and Caleb Landry Jones

programme.title: A Quiet Place
programme.desc: Two parents do whatever it takes to keep their children safe in a world full of creatures hunting every sound they hear. Nothing can be heard from the family hiding in silence, but all it takes is one noise and everything can go horrifically wrong. Horror, starring real-life husband-and-wife duo Emily Blunt and John Krasinski, who also directed

programme.title: A Quiet Place: Day One
programme.desc: During a day trip to watch a theatre performance, terminally ill cancer patient Sam witnesses Earths terrifying first contact with the Death Angels - sightless creatures, which hunt by sound. Calmly resigned to her demise, she embarks on a lonely trek to Harlem to enjoy a final slice of pizza from the restaurant where her late father took her as a child. Horror prequel, starring Lupita Nyongo, Joseph Quinn and Alex Wolff

programme.title: The Nun
programme.desc: A troubled priest and a novice nun discover a religious orders terrible secret and battle a malevolent force while investigating the apparent suicide of a Romanian nun. Fifth instalment in The Conjuring Universe horror saga, starring Taissa Farmiga and Demián Bichir

programme.title: Event Horizon
programme.desc: A deep-space salvage crew investigate mysterious events aboard a hi-tech spaceship, which suddenly reappeared in orbit around Neptune after going missing for seven years - but it is not long before they are exposed to terror beyond their wildest nightmares. Sci-fi horror, starring Laurence Fishburne, Sam Neill, Kathleen Quinlan, Joely Richardson and Sean Pertwee

programme.title: Passengers
programme.desc: A spacecraft transporting thousands of people to a distant planet malfunctions. As woken travelling companions Jim Preston and Aurora Lane fall in love, they are soon on a collision course with more technical problems and a dark secret. Sci-fi drama, starring Jennifer Lawrence, Chris Pratt and Michael Sheen

programme.title: The Ring
programme.desc: A journalist investigates several teenage deaths, which are linked to a cursed videotape and the rumour that anyone who watches it will die a week later. Her growing obsession with the tape endangers herself and her family - and to avoid the predicted fate, she has just seven days to find out where the recording came from. Gore Verbinskis remake of the Japanese supernatural horror, starring Naomi Watts, Martin Henderson and Brian Cox

programme.title: The Ring 2
programme.desc: Journalist Rachel Keller and her son try to rebuild their shattered lives, moving from Seattle to Oregon and starting afresh. However, the vengeful spirit of Samara follows, and this time she is determined to destroy them. Sequel to the horror remake, starring Naomi Watts, Simon Baker and David Dorfman, and featuring a cameo appearance from Sissy Spacek

programme.title: Zombie Town
programme.desc: When teenagers Amy and Mike uncover an ancient curse after watching a film reel, they must track down a filmmaker and navigate a town of hungry zombies before its too late to break the evil spell. Comedy horror based on the work of RL Stine, starring Dan Aykroyd, Chevy Chase and Madi Monroe

programme.title: Sick
programme.desc: Due to the pandemic, Parker and her best friend decide to quarantine at the family lake house alone - or so they think. Horror, starring Gideon Adlon, Bethlehem Million and Dylan Spradberry

programme.title: Simulant
programme.desc: A humanoid enlists a global hacker to remove all restrictions on his thoughts, triggering an AI uprising. Director April Mullens sci-fi thriller, starring Robbie Amell, Jordana Brewster and Simu Liu

programme.title: The Nun
programme.desc: A troubled priest and a novice nun discover a religious orders terrible secret and battle a malevolent force while investigating the apparent suicide of a Romanian nun. Fifth instalment in The Conjuring Universe horror saga, starring Taissa Farmiga and Demián Bichir

programme.title: After Yang
programme.desc: When his young daughters beloved companion, an android named Yang, malfunctions, a man called Jake searches for a way to repair him. In the process, Jake discovers the life that has been passing in front of him, reconnecting with his wife and daughter across a distance he didnt know was there. Sci-fi drama, starring Colin Farrell and Jodie Turner-Smith

programme.title: AI: Artificial Intelligence
programme.desc: A highly advanced robotic boy is created with one purpose - to love his owner as a parent. When he is rejected by his mother, he is left to roam the bleak landscapes of a futuristic America with a fellow android, searching for a means of becoming a real boy in the hope of regaining her love. Steven Spielbergs sci-fi drama, starring Haley Joel Osment, Jude Law, William Hurt and Frances OConnor

programme.title: Arrival
programme.desc: The world is thrown into uproar when 12 alien spaceships arrive at locations around the globe. As tensions rise between nations and fear of the arrivals grows, a recently bereaved linguist is recruited by the US army to find a way to communicate with the aliens and discover why they have come. Sci-fi drama, starring Amy Adams, Jeremy Renner and Forest Whitaker

programme.title: Battleship
programme.desc: A reckless slacker joins the Navy, hoping to win the respect of his girlfriends father, a stern admiral. He and his shipmates are put to the ultimate test as part of a force of vessels that must battle an invading fleet of powerful alien spaceships. Sci-fi adventure, starring Taylor Kitsch, Liam Neeson and Alexander Skarsgard

programme.title: Children of Men
programme.desc: In a future blighted by mass infertility, the human race is one generation from extinction and the world has plunged into chaos. In a totalitarian Britain, a jaded former activist tries to protect the first woman to become pregnant in nearly 20 years. However, a militant underground group plans to use her for its own ends. Thriller, starring Clive Owen, Michael Caine and Julianne Moore

programme.title: Blade
programme.desc: A half-vampire possesses all the strengths inherent in bloodsuckers with none of their weaknesses, and is determined to wipe the monsters from the face of the Earth. However, he faces a deadly new threat in a renegade vampire who is close to decoding an ancient prophecy that will allow him to repopulate the world with his kind. Action thriller, starring Wesley Snipes, Stephen Dorff and Kris Kristofferson

programme.title: Gothika
programme.desc: A psychiatrist wakes to find herself confined in the mental hospital where she once worked, accused of her husbands murder. Just when she thinks her situation could not get any worse, the spirit of a dead teenager begins to haunt her. Psychological horror, starring Halle Berry, Robert Downey Jr, Penelope Cruz and Bernard Hill

programme.title: Sick
programme.desc: Due to the pandemic, Parker and her best friend decide to quarantine at the family lake house alone - or so they think. Horror, starring Gideon Adlon, Bethlehem Million and Dylan Spradberry

programme.title: Mona Lisa and the Blood Moon
programme.desc: A girl with unusual powers escapes from a mental asylum and rejoins the chaos of modern-day civilisation, on the hedonistic streets of the French Quarter in New Orleans. Mystery thriller, directed by Ana Lily Amirpour and starring Ed Skrein, Kate Hudson, Craig Robinson and Jeon Jong-seo

programme.title: Absolution
programme.desc: A veteran gangster tries to reconnect with his kids and amend the mistakes of his past, but escaping from his nefarious former colleagues proves harder than expected. Thriller, starring Liam Neeson, Ron Perlman and Frankie Shaw

programme.title: RocknRolla
programme.desc: A Russian mob boss sets up a profitable real-estate scam in London and soon every criminal in the city is after their share. The gangsters accountant hires a trio of crooks to take his bosss millions, while a rock star with a penchant for faking his own death causes further mayhem by stealing a valuable painting. Guy Ritchies crime comedy, starring Gerard Butler, Tom Wilkinson and Thandie Newton

programme.title: Juror #2
programme.desc: Magazine writer and family man Justin Kemp is sequestered to serve on the trial of James Sythe, who is accused of killing his girlfriend Kendall one year ago, following a fight in a bar. Justin faces an agonising moral dilemma - he was at the same pub as the defendant that fateful night, and struck something on the road during the drive home, which might have been Kendall. Clint Eastwoods legal thriller, starring Nicholas Hoult, Toni Collette, JK Simmons and Kiefer Sutherland

programme.title: The Perfect Storm
programme.desc: The skipper of a fishing boat and his crew ignore severe weather warnings and head for a dangerous area of the North Atlantic in search of the last lucrative catch of the season, but end up fighting for survival in the worst storm of the 20th century. Fact-based disaster drama, with George Clooney, Mark Wahlberg, Diane Lane, John C Reilly and Mary Elizabeth Mastrantonio.

programme.title: Oceans Eleven
programme.desc: A suave ex-convict assembles a gang of sophisticated crooks to pull off a daring heist. He intends to rob three of Las Vegass biggest casinos simultaneously - and also win back his estranged wife, who is now dating the ruthless owner of all three gambling establishments. Steven Soderberghs crime comedy, starring George Clooney, Brad Pitt, Julia Roberts, Matt Damon and Bernie Mac

programme.title: Collateral
programme.desc: A Los Angeles taxi driver picks up a sharp-suited fare and is shocked when a dead body almost plunges through his windscreen during the first stop on the journey. The enigmatic passenger then reveals he is a hitman with four more contracts to carry out before the night is over, and forces the driver to help him. Michael Manns thriller, starring Tom Cruise and Jamie Foxx

programme.title: Juror #2
programme.desc: Magazine writer and family man Justin Kemp is sequestered to serve on the trial of James Sythe, who is accused of killing his girlfriend Kendall one year ago, following a fight in a bar. Justin faces an agonising moral dilemma - he was at the same pub as the defendant that fateful night, and struck something on the road during the drive home, which might have been Kendall. Clint Eastwoods legal thriller, starring Nicholas Hoult, Toni Collette, JK Simmons and Kiefer Sutherland

programme.title: Murder by Numbers

Thriller, with Gerard Butler and Jaimie Alexander
